Drain. Combine with noodles, salt, pepper, mushrooms and mushroom soup in 2 quart casserole. Cover and bake 25 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove from oven, uncover, and pour french fried onions over top. Return to oven, uncovered for five minutes. ; name: strawberry cheesecake pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crusts, fat-free evaporated milk, fat free cream cheese, egg, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, lemon, rind of, fresh strawberries, strawberry jelly ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place evaporated milk, cream cheese, egg, sugar, flour and lemon peel in blender, cover. Blend until smooth, pour into crust. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until center is set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Arrange strawberries on top of pie. Drizzle with jelly. Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving. ; name: no cook brownies ; ingredients: almond meal, cocoa powder, sea salt, agave, water, cocoa nibs ; preparation:Mix almond meal, cacao, salt in mixing bowl. Mix in agave or honey and water. Stir in cacao nibs. Use a 2 tablespoon scooper to portion onto dehydrator trays. Dehydrate for 6 to 7 hours, or to desired consistency. ; name: jeera murg chicken with cumin ; ingredients: boneless chicken, lemon juice, oil, cumin seeds, fresh coriander, salt ; preparation:----toroast cumin or coriander seeds----. Put the seeds in a heavy based frying pan and set the pan over a low heat. Keep shaking the pan until the seeds are well roasted but not burned. Crush them lightly in a mortar and pestle. They keep very well in a tightly sealed jar and can be used in many dishes. Sprinkle the chicken with the lemon juice and some salt. Heat the oil in a heavy based pan until it almost reaches smoking point, then put in the chicken and crushed cumin. Keep the heat high and swirl the chicken around, but not too often. This cools the pan down a little and allows moisture from the chicken to escape. Toss for 2-3 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through, then taste and add more salt if necessary. Sprinkle with coriander and serve. ; name: teriyaki glazed beef kabobs ; ingredients: beef, teriyaki sauce, oriental sesame oil, garlic clove, green onions, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Thread beef cubes onto metal or bamboo skewers. Combine teriyaki sauce, sesame oil, if desired, and garlic in small bowl. Brush beef and onions with part of glaze, saving some for grilling. Let beef stand 15 to 30 minutes. Oil hot grid to help prevent sticking. Grill beef, on covered grill, over mediumkingsford briquets, 6 to 9 minutes for medium doneness, turning several times and brushing with glaze. Add onions and tomatoes, if desired, to grid 3 to 4 minutes. After beef. Grill until onions and tomatoes are tender. Remove from grill. Brush skewers, onions and tomatoes with remaining glaze. ; name: peachy keen banana sherbet ; ingredients: bananas, fresh peaches, cinnamon, nutmeg, splenda granular, fresh blueberries ; preparation:Peel and slice your banana. Slice peaches and remove pits. Place all ingredients in your food processor and puree. Place in freezer overnight or for at least 3 hours. Allow to partially thaw just before serving so your sherbet has a thick, cold texture like ice cream. Top off each serving with a tablespoon of fresh blueberries and a teaspoon of crushed walnuts, if desired. ; name: pork tenderloin with cranberry and porto wine sauce ; ingredients: butter, pork tenderloin, onion, fresh cranberries, wine, liquid honey, dried rosemary, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: lemon yogurt cupcakes ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, egg, plain yogurt, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, lemon extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and use muffin pan, lined with paper liners. In a small bowl, mix together flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, whisk together sugar, butter and egg until smooth. Add yogurt, lemon zest and juice and lemon extract, beating until smooth. Add flour mixture, beating just until smooth. Scoop batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 22 to 25 minutes or until tops of cupcakes spring back when lightly touched. Let cool in pan on rack for 10 minutes. Remove from pan and let cool completely on rack. Top cooled cupcakes with your favorite icing. ; name: 7 up cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, lemon extract, 7-up soda ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour. Beat in lemon extract and 7up. Pour batter into well greased and floured 12 cup fluted mold. Bake at 325 degrees for 60 minutes to an hour and 25 minutes. Cool. Dust with conf. Sugar if desired. ; name: sauteed tilapia fillets with lime ; ingredients: tilapia fillet, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, garlic, dry white wine, lime juice, butter, olive oil, green onions ; preparation:Rinse the fish and pat dry. Put the flour on a plate and season it with salt and pepper. Dredge the fillets in the flour, patting to remove excess. In a small bowl, combine the garlic, wine, lime juice and butter, then set aside. Heat the oil in a 10 to 12-inch frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the fillets without overlapping. Cook until golden on the bottom, about 3 minutes. Turn the fillets over and cook until opaque through the thickest part, 1 to 2 minutes more. Transfer the fish to a platter and keep warm. Add the wine mixture to pan and boil, scraping up cooked bits, until reduced by half, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in the onions and heat on low about 30 seconds. Pour the sauce over the fish and serve. ; name: banana apple brown betty ; ingredients: sugar, salt, cinnamon, apples, bananas, bread cubes, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon together. Combine with sliced apples and bananas. In a skillet, brown bread cubes in the butter. Fill buttered baking dish with alternate layers of bread cubes and fruit using bread cubes as top and bottom layers. Cover dish and bake 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake 15 minutes longer or until apples are tender. ; name: beef taco skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, salsa, water, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: santa fe grilled chicken salad wrap ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, southwestern-seasoned chicken breast, tomatoes, whole kernel corn, mexican cheese, ranch dressing, chunky salsa, flour tortillas ; preparation:Toss romaine, chicken breast strips, tomatoes and corn in large bowl, sprinkle with cheese. Combine dressing with salsa. Pour over romaine mixture. Toss to coat. Spoon evenly into tortillas. Roll up. ; name: cheese it chicken fingers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, sour cream, cheez-it crackers, butter ; preparation:Put the sour cream into a large bowl. Add the chicken strips and mix well to coat with the sour cream. Roll the chicken strips in the crushed cheese its. Coat them well. Place the strips on a baking sheet with a rim and drizzle the butter over them. Bake in a 350f degree oven for 25-30 minutes. ; name: t s favorite chicken and wild rice ; ingredients: chicken, long grain and wild rice blend, water, vegetables, butter ; preparation:

name: mulled white wine with peach juice ; ingredients: dry white wine, peach juice, lemon slices, fresh ginger, ground cinnamon, honey, crystallized ginger ; preparation:Add the first 6 ingredients in a saucepan over low heat. Stir to dissolve the honey. Bring to just a simmer and cook for 2 minutes. Do not let the wine come to a boil. Discard the lemon slices and fresh ginger. Pour the wine into 2 warmed mugs or heatproof glasses. Garnish with crystallized ginger and serve. ; name: walnut and raisin oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: shortening, eggs, oatmeal, baking soda, vanilla, sugar, raisins, flour, salt, english walnuts ; preparation:Cream sugar and shortening thoroughly. Add eggs and mix well. Add ground raisins and nuts. Mix well. Sift together dry ingredients and add to shortening mixture. Add vanilla and mix all together. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart and flatten with a fork. Bake at 350 for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: basic polenta ; ingredients: vegetable broth, water, cornmeal, kosher salt, scallion, tomato sauce ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over high heat, bring the vegetable broth and the water to a boil. Slowly pour the cornmeal into the hot liquid, wisking constantly. Stir in the salt. Lower the heat to cook the mixture at a gentle simmer. Cook, stirring frequently, until the cornmeal is creamy and not grainy, about 30 minutes. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in scallion. Polenta can be served soft, or poured into a baking pan to cool. Once cooled, polenta can then be cut into solid squares. ; name: rich topping for steaks or veal ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, tomato ketchup, sour cream, tabasco sauce, black pepper, grainy mustard, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix first 7 ingredients with a fork. Roast or grill meat until nearly done as you like it. Spread the cheese mixture over each portion of meat. Sprinkle over the parmesan. Grill carefully -- watching -- until the cheese melts. Serve immediately on warmed plates. ; name: lemon green beans ; ingredients: green beans, water, lemon juice, unsalted butter, lemon, rind of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place beans in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are tender. Rinse under cold water and drain. Combine water and lemon juice in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Simmer 2-3 minutes or until reduced by half. Stir in butter. Add green beans and lemon peel. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Remove from heat. Add parsley and salt to taste and toss. ; name: another hot crab dip recipe ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, backfin crab meat, green onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, dijon mustard and worcestershire sauce. Gently stir in the crabmeat and most of the green onions. Reserve some green onions for garnish. Spoon the mixture into a 1-quart buttered casserole dish. Bake for 20-30 minutes until top is set and mixture is hot. Garnish the top with remaining green onions. Serve dip with tortilla chips or crackers. ; name: savory crock pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, dried thyme, basil leaves, salt & pepper, garlic cloves, red wine, water, baby carrots, white button mushrooms ; preparation:Cover both sides of roast with italian dressing mix and place in crock pot. Sprinkle thyme and basil over top of roast. Add salt and pepper. Gently pour red wine and water over and around roast being careful not to wash the spices off the roast. Sprinkle minced garlic over the roast. Top roast with baby carrots and mushrooms. Finish with a little more salt and pepper. Set crock pot on high for two hours, and then low for five to six more. ; name: apple pecan and blue cheese salad with dried cherries ; ingredients: salad greens, apples, pecan halves, dried cherries, blue cheese, dijon mustard, maple syrup, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: 2blueberry pineapple ring ; ingredients: berry gelatin, water, blueberries in light syrup, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Completely dissolve gelatin in boiling water by gently stirring for 3-4 minutes. Let cool to room temperature. Stir in blueberries and crushed pineapple. Pour into a bundt pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Refrigerate for 4 hours or longer to congeal. To loosen ring from mold, place mold in larger bowl of hot water for a few seconds, then remove by placing the serving platter on top, and flip over. ; name: linguine with red pepper sauce ; ingredients: cooking spray, olive oil, sweet red peppers, garlic clove, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, salt, black pepper, linguine, basil sprig ; preparation:Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add oil. Place over medium heat until hot. Add sweet red pepper and garlic. Cook, uncovered, 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Set aside, and cool slightly. Place pepper mixture in container of an electric blender or food processor. Add chopped basil and next 3 ingredients. Cover and process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides. Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. To serve, top pasta with pepper sauce. Garnish with basil sprigs, if desired. ; name: chopped barbecue beef sandwich ; ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, white onion, dill pickle, jalapeno, whole wheat hamburger buns ; preparation:On cutting board, cut beef into small pieces. Place in saucepan and mix in barbegue sauce until evenly coated and moist. Heat over low-medium until warmed. Spoon onto bun and top with onion & pickle slices. Top with additional barbeque sauce as desired. ; name: easy cocoa 1 layer cake ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, water, powdered sugar ; preparation:Stir dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs, vanilla and water. Mix in dry ingredients. Mix well. Bake in preheated 350 oven in buttered and floured 9 inch cake pan for about an hour or til cake tests done with a toothpick. Cool in pan for an hour then remove to rack and sift powdered sugar over top. ; name: lost souls poached salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, sliced mushrooms, green onion, honey, sugar, vinegar, garlic powder, onion powder, butter ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet. Add mushrooms and green onions. Saute for about 1 minute. Add vinegar, garlic, onion powder, sugar, and honey. Mix well and bring to a boil. Turn heat down to med. Add salmon filets and let poach for about 15 min or until fish is flakey. ; name: lazy mini okonomiyaki ; ingredients: cabbage, flour, dashi, sake, light soy sauce, eggs, green onions, ham, oil, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a non-stick skillet, saute the cabbage mix. Allow to cool to room temperature before adding to the batter. Mix flour, dashi, sake, soy sauce, and eggs together in a large bowl until smooth, although a few small lumps are fine. To the batter, add the cooled cabbage mixture, ham and the green onions. Mix well. Using the same non-stick skillet that you used to cook the cabbage, heat over medium, a small amount of oil or spray with cooking spray. Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls into the pan. Cook until golden on each side. Serve hot, room temperature, or cold with kewpie mayonnaise and bull-dog tonkatsu sauce. ; name: banana berry oatmeal ; ingredients: nonfat milk, banana, berries, oatmeal, toasted wheat germ, honey ; preparation:In a small pan, heat milk until simmering. Add banana and berries, stir, then add oatmeal and wheat germ. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until milk is absorbed. Let stand 2 minutes. Sweeten with honey. ; name: fresh herb butter ; ingredients: unsalted butter, fresh basil, fresh marjoram, fresh rosemary, fresh chives, fresh lemon juice, lemon, zest of, garlic ; preparation:

name: oven fried garlic rosemary chicken ; ingredients: frying chickens, flour, rosemary, garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, shortening ; preparation:Wash chicken and dry. Combine flour, rosemary, garlic powder, black pepper and salt. Turn into a large bag. Place all the chicken at once into the bag with the flour mix. Shake until all pieces are coated well. Melt shortening in a 13x9x2 baking pan in a 400 preheated oven. Arrange chicken in the hot fat in the pan, skin side down. Bake 30 minutes or until the underside is golden brown. Turn chicken and bake another 30- 40 minutes until done. ; name: 7 layer cookies ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, shredded coconut, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts ; preparation:Melt 1 stick butter in a jelly roll pan. Spread in pan - 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs. 1 cup of shredded coconut. 6 oz of butterscotch chips. 6 oz. Of chocolate chips. Drizzle one can of sweet condensed milk on top. Add 1 cup of chopped walnuts on top. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. Remove and let cool and then cut into squares. ; name: skillet minestrone meal ; ingredients: ground beef, diced tomatoes, beef broth, red wine, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni, kidney beans, garbanzo beans, green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Drain and rinse beans. Set aside. Brown the beef in a large skillet. Drain fat. Add the tomatoes, broth, wine, seasoning, macaroni and beans. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer until macaroni is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed. About 15 minutes. ; name: alder planked salmon with soy ginger marinade ; ingredients: minced garlic cloves, soy sauce, fresh ginger, fresh parsley, canola oil, boneless salmon fillets, sesame seeds, scallions ; preparation:Soak plank in water to cover for 1 hour or longer if possible and drain. Prepare barbeque. Combine garlic, soy sauce, ginger, parsley, and oil in large zip bag. Shake to combine. Add salmon to marinade. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes, turning once. Place soaked plank on grill grate over medium-heat. Heat plank for 2 to 3 minutes, urn plank, and continue heating for an additional 3 minutes. Remove salmon from marinade. Discard marinade and place salmon, skin side down on charred side of plank. Grill salmon, with lid down, approximately 15 minutes, or until fish is medium rare or to your liking. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and scallions. ; name: baking powder dumplings ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, milk, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and egg and stir to make soft dough. Add 3 quarts of water to a large pot or dutch oven. Put 1 tsp salt and 1 tbsp oil in water and bring to boil. Drop dough by tablespoonful into boiling water. Boil five minutes on one side. Turn and boil another five minutes. Remove from water. ; name: pasta with bacon and tomato pesto ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, pepper bacon, pesto sauce, romano cheese, black pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain tomatoes, reserve some of the oil. Cut tomatoes into strips. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium high heat until crisp. Drain and crumble. Drain pasta and place in a large bowl. Add tomatoes and pesto. Toss. Add bacon and cheese. Toss. If necessary add the reserved oil. Season with pepper. ; name: party tray wrap up ; ingredients: cream cheese spread, fresh spinach, zucchini, marinated artichoke hearts, green olives, pepperoni, gouda cheese, flour tortilla ; preparation:Spread tortilla with cream cheese spread. Arrange spinach leaves in straight line down center of tortilla. Top with pepperoni and cheese. Sprinkle with zucchini, artichokes and olives. Roll tortilla tightly, burrito style. Serve at room temperature. ; name: copycat costco r deli mac and cheese ; ingredients: cavatappi pasta, butter, heavy cream, pepper, garlic salt, pecorino romano cheese, parmesan cheese, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: gruyere potato gratin ; ingredients: potatoes, gruyere, onions, garlic, butter, heavy cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden. ; name: nitkos sauce for fried calamari ; ingredients: mayonnaise, capers, pickled cucumbers, anchovies, mustard, chives, lemon juice, sour cream ; preparation:Very finely mince capers and pickled cucumbers. Mince fresh chive very finely. Make paste out of salted anchovy. Put mayonnaise and sour cream in a sauce bowl stir them to make unique paste. Add cucumbers, capers, mustard, chive, anchovy, and lemon juice and stir well. If necessary, add salt. Serve with fried calamari. ; name: linguini alfredo ; ingredients: butter, heavy cream, garlic cloves, romano cheese, dried parsley flakes, dried basil, salt and pepper, linguine ; preparation:Cook linguini as directed on box. While noodles cook heat butter and garlic in small saucepan over medium heat until butter is melted and garlic is browned. Add cream and heat until bubbling. Add cheese, parsley, basil, salt and pepper. Return drained noodles to kettle. Pour sauce over noodles, stirring gently until all are well coated. ; name: hot faux crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, albacore tuna in water, mayonnaise, old bay seasoning, garlic, onion ; preparation:Mix all. Pour into a heatproof dish and top with breadcrumbs or cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 15 to 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or thin slices of french bread. ; name: ham squares ; ingredients: cream cheese, deviled ham, pepper, onions, pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In medium bowl, blend cream cheese, ham, pepper and onion together. Separate the two cans of dough into 8 rectangles. Firmly press together perforations to seal. Roll out to make more square. Spoon mixture into the center of each square. Fold up the corners and twist at the top, seal any open edges. Bake 20-25 minutes until golden brown. Allow 2 per serving. ; name: cuban garlic sauce mojo cubano ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, sour orange juice, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:For the mojo, you will need a large bowl. In a large bowl, pour the sour orange juice or lime juice, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic and sliced onion into the bowl and stir. Heat the olive oil over medium-high for 2 minutes, then when hot, pour olive oil into bowl. Be careful not to get burned, since some of it might splatter out. Mix the mojo ingredients, then let sit for 30 minutes. ; name: skier s beef stew crock pot ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, beef stew meat, tomato sauce, water, onion soup mix ; preparation:

name: pesto chicken grill packets ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt and pepper, pesto sauce, zucchini, plum tomatoes, scallions ; preparation:Preheat a grill to medium. Cut four 12-inch-long sheets of heavy-duty foil. Drizzle 1 teaspoon olive oil into the center of each sheet. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Lay 1 piece of chicken in the center of each sheet and spread 1 tablespoon pesto on top. Mound one-quarter of the zucchini, tomatoes and scallions over each chicken breast. Dollop 3 tablespoons pesto over each mound. Fold the foil over the chicken and vegetables. Pinch the edges to seal. Cover and grill the packets over indirect heat for 25 minutes. Remove from the grill and open carefully. ; name: roast honey chicken with apple cream sauce ; ingredients: chicken pieces, honey, apple cider, dry mustard, salt and pepper, green apple, thickened cream, brandy ; preparation:Place honey, cider, mustard, salt and pepper in a bowl. Beat well until combined. Place chicken in a lightly greased baking dish. Pour honey mixture over chicken. Cook chicken 45 minutes. Place on plates. Pour any pan juices in baking dish in saucepan. Add cider, apple slices and brandy. Bring to boil. Lower heat, simmer until it has reduced slightly. ; name: curried string green beans ; ingredients: onion, oil, garlic cloves, string beans, tomatoes, tomato paste, curry powder, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saut onion in oil until lightly browned. Add garlic and saut briefly. Add remaining ingredients. Add water to just barely cover string beans. Mix well. Partially cover and cook on low flame for approximately 40 minutes, until string beans are tender and liquid is partially absorbed. ; name: chicken burgers ; ingredients: cooked chicken, breadcrumbs, onion, eggs, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use and then form into 6 patties. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Serve on hamburger buns with lettuce, mayo and tomatoes or as desired. ; name: pumpkin garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken stock, pumpkin, garlic cloves, dry white wine, butter, heavy cream, salt & pepper, dried mustard, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Melt butter in pot and cook garlic. Pour in pumpkin. Stir in chicken stock until smooth. Add dried mustard and worcestershire sauce if desired. Cook for approximately 20 minutes. Add white wine. Stir in heavy cream in the last 1-2 minutes and cook only until warmed through. Season to taste. ; name: sparkling peach splash ; ingredients: peaches, peach schnapps, fresh lime juice, champagne, peach slices ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth. Freeze 1 hour. Pour champagne into a pitcher. Spoon peach mixture into pitcher. Stir to combine. Garnish with peach slices, if desired. Serve immediately. ; name: easy blender chocolate mousse ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, egg, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Place chocolate chips, egg and vanilla into blender and blend for 30 seconds. Remove center of blender lid and while machine is running, slowly pour heated cream into the chocolate mixture. Blend until well mixed and chocolate chips are melted. Pour into parfait or wine glasses and refrigerate until set. Can serve with a garnish of sweetened whipped cream. ; name: goat cheese chicken rolls ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, goat cheese, white pepper, salt, garlic powder, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: ajvar eggplant aubergine peppers ; ingredients: eggplants, red sweet peppers, salt, pepper, garlic clove, lemon, oil, parsley ; preparation:Bake eggplants and sweet peppers at 350 f until tender when pierced with a fork. Peel skin from hot vegetables and chop or mince the vegetables. Season to taste with salt and pepper and stir in the garlic and lemon juice. Gradually stir in as much of the oil as the vegetables will absorb. Mix well. Pile into a glass dish and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: devilled chicken low carb ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Combine the oil, lemon juice and rind, garlic, chilli and seasoning in a shallow bowl. Add the chicken pieces and coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. Thread the chicken onto 12 oiled skewers and cook under a preheated grill for 6-8 minutes, turning frequently. Delicious served with a mixed leaf salad with red capsicum added. I did not bother with a salad dressing as the chicken is so beautifully piquant. Prep time does not include marinade time of 4 hours. ; name: mix in the pan chocolate cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vegetable oil, white vinegar, cold water, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a square 9 inch pan stir together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Add oil, vinegar, water, and vanilla. Mix until combined, making sure there are no clumps of flour mixture. Spread batter evenly in pan. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack. ; name: smoked ham pie swedish quiche skinkpaj ; ingredients: pie crust, smoked ham, egg yolks, sour cream, gruyere cheese, salt and pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Press pastry dough into baking pan. Set oven to 350f. Combine egg yolks, sour cream, ham, and cheese. Pour over dough, like a pizza. Bake at 350f for 40-60 minutes, depends on oven as they vary. ; name: boxing day turkey soup ; ingredients: boiling water, chicken bouillon, cooked turkey, tomatoes with juice, carrots, celery, onion, minute rice, dried parsley, dried thyme ; preparation:Combine oxo and boiling water. Add to crockpot. Dump tomatoes into crockpot and mash gently. Add turkey, carrots, celery, onion, rice, parsley and thyme. Stir well. Cover and cook on low for 10 hours. This can be combined and refrigerated overnight before cooking. ; name: mocha cream iced soda ; ingredients: instant decaffeinated coffee, hot water, equal sugar substitute, ice cubes, low-fat chocolate frozen yogurt, soda water ; preparation:Dissolve the coffee in the hot water. Add the sugar substitute and place mixture in the refrigerator or freezer to cool for a few minutes. When ready to serve, divide the ice cubes and the coffee mixture equally in two tall glasses. Add half the frozen yogurt to each glass. Pour the soda water equally over the frozen yogurt. Serve with a straw and a long spoon. ; name: honey and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, green onions, garlic clove, honey, orange juice, orange, soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked. ; name: white bean tuna and tomato salad ; ingredients: chunk light tuna, small white beans, ripe olives, tomatoes, celery, green onions, italian parsley, red wine and vinegar salad dressing, lettuce leaf, hardboiled egg ; preparation:

name: no flour no sugar pancakes ; ingredients: yogurt, banana, old-fashioned oatmeal, walnuts, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix oatmeal with yogurt and set aside. Mash banana and chop the walnuts. Mix all ingredients together. Cook as you would other pancakes. Sprinkle with more cinnamon if desired, or top with applesauce. ; name: brazilian mocha ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, strong coffee, sugar, salt, milk, cream ; preparation:Stir the coffee and the chocolate in the top of a double boiler over direct heat until the chocolate is melted and completely blended into the coffee. Mix in a few grains salt and the sugar. Boil for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly. Place the top of the double boiler over hot water in the bottom. Gradually mix in the scalding milk. When the mixture is near the boiling point, beat with an electric mixer until light and frothy. Pour into 4 cups or mugs and top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: thai chicken thighs crock pot ; ingredients: chicken thighs, chicken stock, smooth peanut butter, soy sauce, fresh cilantro, lime juice, hot chili pepper, fresh ginger, peanuts ; preparation:Place chicken thighs in slow cooker. Combine stock, peanut butter, soy sauce, cilantro, lime juice, chile pepper and ginger. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro. ; name: olive garden capellini pomodoro ; ingredients: pasta, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, romano cheese, olive oil, fresh tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Boil pasta in salted water and drain. You may process garlic, olive oil, basil leaves, salt and pepper whole in mini chopper or food processor and then stir into drained noodles. Or add garlic, olive oil, and basil. Stir well. Add salt, pepper, and tomatoes. Adjust seasonings to taste. Top with parmesan, romano, or asiago cheese. ; name: a healthier apple nut snack cake ; ingredients: egg beaters egg substitute, vanilla, splenda brown sugar blend, cinnamon, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, apples, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and grease 8-inch square pan. In large mixing bow, beat egg beaters and vanilla until frothy. Gradually add splenda brown sugar, continuing to beat after each addition. Add cinnamon, baking powder and salt. Gradually add flour continuing to beat after each addition. Stir in apples and nuts. Pour into greased pan. Bake 30 to 45 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Serve warm or cool. Can be topped with whipped cream. ; name: sticky cucumber and peanut dipping sauce ; ingredients: rice vinegar, sugar, salt, cucumber, red onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic clove, roasted peanuts, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Place the vinegar, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan and heat, stirring until the sugar has completely dissolved. Boil for around 6-7 minutes or until a thin syrup has formed. Squeeze the grated cucumber to remove most of the liquid. When the syrup has cooled, add the cucumber, red onion, jalepeno, garlic, peanuts and cilantro. Mix together thoroughly. Serve at room temperature with fried or boiled shrimp, coconut shrimp, egg rolls, meat sate etc. ; name: mary s pineapple cake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, eggs, margarine, evaporated milk, coconut, pecans ; preparation:Mix all the cake ingredients together with a spoon. Bake in a greased 9 x13 inch pan for 35 to 40 minutes at 350 degrees fahrenheit. While the cake bakes make the topping. Bring margarine, sugar and evaporated milk to a boil. Stirring occasionally. Boil for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in coconut and nuts. Pour this mixture over the cake as soon as it comes from the oven. ; name: ground turkey and barley casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, celery, bell pepper, quick-cooking barley, tomato paste, beef broth, water, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: custard tart ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, cornflour, milk, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean. ; name: mocha macaroons ; ingredients: egg whites, instant coffee granules, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, baking cocoa, flaked coconut ; preparation:Heat oven to 300 degrees. Lightly grease cookie sheets. Beat egg whites, coffee, cream of tartar, and salt in medium bowl on low speed until foamy. Beat in sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time on high speed until stiff. Do not underbeat. Stir in cocoa until smooth. Fold in coconut. Drop mixture by rounded teaspoonfuls 1 inch apart on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes, then remove from cookie sheet. Sprinkle with cocoa or drizzle with melted chocolate. ; name: jam muffins apricot etc ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, vanilla essence, butter, eggs, milk, apricot jam, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat the oven at 200c. Sift the flour, baking powder and salt together into a baking bowl. Make a hollow in the dry ingredients. Beat the eggs and milk together and add with melted butter into the middle of the dry ingredients mixing just enough to moisten the mixture. Spoon a largish tablespoon of the mixture into the bottom of the muffin form, making certain that it covers the bottom of the muffin form. Make a small hollow in the middle if the muffin mixture and set a teaspoon of apricot jam into the hollow, try not to let the jam run out to the sides very much. Cover the apricot jam with another spoonful of the muffin mix and run a clean finger around it so that the jam is as enclosed by the muffin mixture as possible. Bake at 200c for 15 minutes or until cooked. Ease the muffins out of the form while warm and put onto a wire rack to cool. Once cool, dust the tops with powdered sugar. ; name: asparagus quiche ; ingredients: asparagus spears, eggs, sour cream, gruyere cheese, sliced mushrooms, garlic, fresh tarragon, red pepper, salt and pepper, 9-inch deep dish pie crust ; preparation:Blanch asparagus spears in boiling water for 90 seconds. Refresh in cold water and cut in half. Set aside. Blend together eggs, sour cream, cheese, mushrooms, and garlic tarragon. Add asparagus and season with salt and pepper. Pour ingredients into a 9-inch deep dish pie shell. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven. Top with julienned red pepper and return to oven for 30-40 minutes. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: mock wonton soup ; ingredients: ready-to-serve chicken broth, tortellini, chinese vegetables, green onion, sesame oil, fresh gingerroot ; preparation:In a large saucepan, place the chicken broth and, over high heat, bring it to a boil. Add frozen tortellini and veggies, let return to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, or until tortellini is tender. Stir occasionally. Remove from heat, stir in onion, sesame oil, and ginger. Serve. ; name: loaded lemonade ; ingredients: fresh orange juice, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, tequila, triple sec, sprite ; preparation:Add first four ingredients to a pitcher or large bowl. Stir to combine. Chill for 2 hours. Right before ready to serve, add sprite. Stir to combine. Serve in ice-filled glasses. ; name: lebanese hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, sesame oil, lemon juice, turmeric, chili powder, cilantro, paprika, salt ; preparation:

name: armenian lemon rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, long grain rice, lemon zest, white pepper, chicken broth, lemon juice, fresh parsley, lemon ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely coated with butter. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add lemon juice and stir. Let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices to serve. ; name: hibiscus iced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea, sugar, sparkling apple cider, lemon wedge ; preparation:Pour 4 cups boiling water over tea bags. Cover. Steep 10 minutes. Discard tea bags. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Chill until ready to serve. Stir in sparkling cider, and serve over ice. Garnish, if desired. ; name: chocolate orange velvet tart ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, brown sugar, butter, heavy whipping cream, milk, turbinado sugar, orange zest, ground cinnamon, semisweet chocolate, sweetened whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Combine the first 3 ingredients in a bowl. Press firmly into a lightly greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake for 11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven and let cool. In a saucepan, combine the cream and next 4 ingredients. Bring to a simmer over med-low heat. Remove from heat. Add in chocolate, and stir until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. Pour filling into baked crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of orange zest. ; name: fillet bubbly bake ; ingredients: fish fillet, cream of mushroom soup, onions, lemon juice, cheese, water ; preparation:Cut the frozen fillets in four portions. Place in a shallow greased casserole. Mix the mushroom soup, onion, lemon juice and water and pour over the fillets. Top with grated cheese. Bake in hot over for 20 minutes or until done. ; name: african banana coconut bake ; ingredients: bananas, margarine, orange juice, lemon juice, brown sugar, shredded coconut ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Cut bananas crosswise into halves. Cut each half lengthwise into halves and arrange in greased 9-inch pie plate. Dot with margarine or butter and drizzle with orange and lemon juices. Sprinkle with brown sugar and coconut. Bake until coconut is golden, 8 to 10 minutes. ; name: chipotle chicken baked empanada s made easy ; ingredients: chicken meat, salsa, chipotle pepper, monterey jack pepper cheese, refrigerated pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f and spray a large baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In a small bowl, stir together shredded cooked chicken, salsa, chipotle peppers and cheese. Unfold pie crust and roll out to make slightly thinner. Using a 3-inch cutter, cut dough into circles. Brush edges lightly with water. Place a small amount of filling in the center of each and fold over to enclose. Press edges with the tines of a fork to seal and place on prepared baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes or until pastry is golden brown. Serve with additional salsa and guacamole, if desired. ; name: dolores chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, vegetable shortening, creamy peanut butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl, set aside. Combine shortening, peanut butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix until well blended. Blend in reserved dry ingredients, stir in coconut. Batter will be very stiff. Spread batter into a well-greased 13x9x2in baking pan. Bake at 350 degree for 25-35 minutes, or until golden brown. Cut into bars when completely cool. ; name: north beach grilled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dried oregano, dried basil, black pepper, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, boneless skinless chicken thighs ; preparation:

name: mediterranean marinated cheese ; ingredients: cream cheese, sun-dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, black pepper, lemon peel ; preparation:Cube cream cheese into 36 pieces. Place on serving tray. Combine remaining ingredients. Pour dressing over cheese and toss lightly. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. ; name: potato egg bake ; ingredients: butter, onion, frozen hash browns, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Cook, drain and crumble bacon. Melt butter or margarine in a skillet. Add onions and hash browns. Cook and stir until potatoes are lightly browned. Grease a 9x13 inch pan and place hash browns in the bottom of the pan. Beat eggs, milk and salt and pepper 1- 2 minutes. Stir in grated cheese and bacon. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees 45-50 minutes, until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: carrot salad with black mustard seeds ; ingredients: carrot, red bell peppers, cashews, salt, vegetable oil, black mustard seeds, cilantro ; preparation:If very moist, press shredded carrots dry before mixing the salad. Mix carrots, bell pepper, cashews and salt. In a small pan heat oil over medium heat until hot. Add mustard seeds and fry until they sputter and turn grey. Pour oil and seeds over salad, add herbs and toss to mix. Serve. ; name: tangy cranberry relish ; ingredients: cranberries, orange juice, sugar, walnuts, orange, rind of, ground ginger ; preparation:Bring orange juice to a boil. Add washed cranberries and sugar. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. Mash berries with a potato masher. Stir in remaining ingredients. Chill for several hours and serve. ; name: strawberries and oranges in syrup ; ingredients: water, sugar, basil, strawberries, oranges ; preparation:Bring water and sugar to a boil and cook until clear and sugar is dissolved. Let syrup cool briefly and add basil. Set aside to steep and cool. Wash strawberries, removing and discarding caps and then cut into quarters. Cut away the orange peel from the oranges, and then cut oranges into sections. Put the strawberries and orange pieces in a bowl. Toss. Pour syrup over fruit. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes. ; name: ginger glazed almonds with dried fruit ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, fresh ginger, sea salt, ground ginger, blanched almonds, cooking spray, berries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Stir in sugar, water, fresh ginger, salt, and ground ginger. Cook until sugar dissolves. Stir in almonds and remove from heat. Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cooking spray. Spread almonds onto foil, and bake 25 to 35 minutes, stirring once, until almonds are golden. Transfer almonds on foil to a rack and cool completely. Loosen with a spatula and combine with dried fruit. Store mixture airtight for up to 3 days. ; name: buckeye candy ; ingredients: peanut butter, powdered sugar, butter, chocolate-flavored candy coating ; preparation:Mix peanut butter and powdered sugar together in mixer, then mix in the butter. Roll mixture into balls. Melt the chocolate candy coating according to package directions. Dip balls into melted chocolate leaving a circle of peanut butter showing. Place on wax paper. Store in refrigerator. ; name: strawberry watermelon lemonade ; ingredients: watermelon, strawberries, sugar, frozen lemonade, fresh lemon juice, lemon slice ; preparation:

name: bay flavored brown wild rice ; ingredients: brown rice, wild rice, chicken stock, bay leaves, dried shallots, butter, salt ; preparation:If using dry shallots, rehydrate by soaking in 2 tbsp water for 5 minutes. In a 2 quart saucepan, saut shallots in butter until lightly browned. Add both types of rice, chicken stock, salt, and bay leaves. Bring to a rapid boil, cover, and reduce to a simmer. Simmer for 45 minutes and do not remove the cover until the 45 minutes have passed. Fluff with a fork. If any liquid is left after 45 minutes, stir lightly, then continue to cook over low heat for about 5 more minutes, or until all water is gone. ; name: cheery cherry macaroons ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, almond extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, flaked coconut, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a mixing bowl, cream sugar and shortening together. Add eggs and almond extract and mix well. Combine flour, soda, powder and salt and gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in coconut and cherries, this will take a bit because the dough is very stiff. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased or non stick cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool on racks. ; name: sonoma diet hummus ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, tahini, water, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, kosher salt, cumin seed, cayenne pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:In a food processor combine garbanzo beans, tahini, the water, the 2 tablespoons lemon juice, the oil, garlic, kosher salt, cumin seeds, and cayenne pepper. Cover and process until smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl. Stir in the 1 tablespoon parsley. If desired, stir in additional lemon juice to taste. Garnish with additional parsley. Serve with baked pita chips or vegetable dippers, or use as a spread in a grilled vegetable sandwich. Add seeds. Cook about 2 minutes or until toasted and aromatic, shaking skillet frequently. Place toasted seeds in a spice grinder and process until finely ground. ; name: pasta with tomatoes olives and capers ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, black olives, capers, flat leaf parsley, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Toss the tomatoes and garlic together and drain them in a strainer while you continue with the recipe. Bring a large pot of well-salted water to a boil and cook the pasta until al dente. Drain it well, return it to the pot, and toss it with the tomato mixture. Toss again with the olive oil, olives, capers, parsley, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 3 to 5 minutes to absorb the flavors before serving. ; name: cocoa chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, cake flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high for 15-30 seconds, or until just melted. Stir in brown sugar, cocoa and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in cake flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 1 hour, or until firm. Preheat oven to 350f. Break off small pieces of dough and form into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until firm but not browned. Cool on baking sheets 5 minutes, then remove to rack to cool completely. ; name: lentils with chorizo red wine ; ingredients: green lentils, onions, garlic clove, chicken stock, red wine vinegar, red wine, chorizo sausage, parsley, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry the onion and garlic in a little oil then add the lentils, red wine, stock, vinegar and thyme. Simmer gently for 30 minutes until tender, add the chorizo for the last 5 minutes of cooking time. Season with salt and pepper. Stir through the parsley. Serve with lots of crusty bread. ; name: cran fizzy iced tea ; ingredients: green tea bags, frozen cranberry juice concentrate, water, club soda ; preparation:Steep 4 tea bags in 2 cups boiling water according to package directions. Discard tea bags. Stir in can of frozen cranberry juice concentrate. Cover and chill. To serve, fill a glass of ice one-quarter full with tea mixture. Top off with chilled club soda. You may also add fresh berries as a garnish. ; name: crispy chicken ; ingredients: crisp rice cereal, all-purpose flour, salt, dried thyme, poultry seasoning, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: marinated asparagus hearts of palm and cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, hearts of palm, olive oil, cider vinegar, garlic cloves, pepper, sea salt, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Snap off the tough ends of the asparagus, and remove scales with a pairing knife or vegetable peeler. Blanch asparagus in boiling water for 4 minutes, then submerge in cold water to stop the cooking process. Drain well. Asparagus should be crisp-tender. Combine asparagus & drained hearts of palm and place in a heavy duty zip-top bag. Combine well the next 4 ingredients, and pour into bag. Marinate vegetables, turning bag occasionally for about 8 hours. When ready to serve - add cherry tomatoes and serve in dressing with a slotted spoon. ; name: amish schnitzel beans ; ingredients: bacon, onions, fresh green beans, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:Dice bacon and fry until crisp. Add sliced onions and fry until a light brown. Add green beans and brown slightly. Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and water. Lower heat and cook until beans are tender. ; name: easy broiled scallops ; ingredients: bay scallop, butter, olive oil, lemon pepper, garlic, garlic powder, seafood seasoning, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven for broiling. Melt butter, add olive oil, lemon juice and seasonings. Add scallops, stir to coat. Place in broiler, i use a small cake pan. Broil for 3 to 4 minutes, stir and cook for 3 to 4 minutes more or until done. Depending on size of scallops, may take a little longer, mine were dime sized. You may sprinkle a little parmesan after you take out for a little different taste. Serve hot, maybe with some crusty bread for dipping. ; name: lemon passionfruit butter ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, butter, passion fruit, lemons, juice of, water, lemon zest ; preparation:In a heatproof bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar until combined. Place over a pan of gently simmering water. Gradually add all remaining ingredients. Whisk over low heat 10-15 minutes, until the mixture thickens and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Do not boil. Pour into sterilised jars and seal. The bottles can be stored in a cool place but must be refrigerated once opened. ; name: broiled salmon with black pepper and lime rub ; ingredients: salmon fillets, limes, kosher salt, black pepper, garlic, lime ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Place salmon, skin sides down, on a coated broiler pan. Rub lime zest, salt, peper and garlic over the fish. Broil for 7 minutes, the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Serve with lime wedges, if desired. ; name: roast duck with a honey soy basting sauce ; ingredients: duck, dijon mustard, soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, dry white wine, olive oil, cornflour ; preparation:Wash duck under cold water and remove any missed feathers. Combine all the basting ingredients and boil over a high heat for about 2 minutes. Keep sauce warm while basting, stirring occasionally. Place duck in a roasting dish, brush with basting sauce. Bake in a slow oven for about three hours, bast several times while cooking. Turn the oven up to 170-180 and continue to roast for a further 30-45 minutes until skin is browned and crisp and duck is cooked through. As the duck is finishing off, mix a little water with cornflour, turn up the heat on stove, add cornflour to basting sauce and stir until mixture thickens. Serve duck with basting sauce. ; name: crumb topped creamy mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, milk, cheddar cheese, ritz crackers, non-hydrogenated margarine, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cook potatoes in large saucepan of boiling water 15 to 20 minute or until potatoes are tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash with hand masher until smooth, gradually adding milk and mixing well after each addition. Stir in cheese. Spoon into 2-l casserole dish. Mix cracker crumbs, garlic powder and margarine. Sprinkle over potato mixture. Bake 20 to 25 minute or until potato mixture is heated through and topping is lightly browned. ; name: vegetarian mexican breakfast casserole ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, green bell pepper, eggs, sour cream, flour tortillas, pace picante sauce, cheese ; preparation:

name: asian style salmon or tofu ; ingredients: bok choy, red bell pepper, salmon fillets, pepper, scallions, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, gingerroot ; preparation:Heat oven to 400. Tear off four 15-inch squares of parchment paper. Arrange them evenly on baking sheets. Divide the bok choy and bell pepper evenly on the squares. Place the salmon on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with pepper. Top each square with scallions. In a small bowl, combine soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and ginger. Spoon the mixture over the salmon or tofu. Top with another 4 squares of parchment paper and fold the edges over several times to seal. Bake for 15 minutes. When done baking, slit the parchment paper to open and serve, being cautious of the hot steam. For vegetarian use only the tofu. ; name: cafe au lait ; ingredients: coffee, water, milk, sugar ; preparation:Brew coffee. Heat milk, almost to a boil. Pour coffee and hot milk, preferably simultaneously, into large cups or mugs. Sweeten to taste. If you like the frothy finish that traditional steam infusers give to cafe au lait, whirl the hot milk in a blender before filling cups. ; name: diet pineapple muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, artificial sweetener, salt, margarine, crushed pineapple, egg ; preparation:Combine flour, baking powder, sweetner and salt. Add melted butter. Add beaten egg and 19 oz tin of crushed pineapple. Ingredients will be very thick in texture. Line your muffin pan cups with cupcake papers. Bake 18 minutes at 400f. ; name: cointreau glazed peaches ; ingredients: peach halves in syrup, cointreau liqueur, soft brown sugar, mascarpone cheese ; preparation:Drain the peaches and reserve half the syrup. Place in an ovenproof dish and pour over the reserved syrup. Sprinkle the fruit with the cointreau then the sugar. Grill for 5 minutes or until a golden glaze has formed on the top. Serve immediately with a spoonful of mascarpone. ; name: italian style tomato sauce ; ingredients: italian plum tomatoes, olive oil, onions, tomato paste, basil, oregano, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks. ; name: chicken pizza ole ; ingredients: pizza crusts, butter, ground chicken, garlic powder, salsa, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Place pizza crust onto ungreased baking sheet. Melt butter in 8-inch skillet until sizzling. Add chicken and garlic powder. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink. Stir in salsa. Spread evenly onto crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned and bubbly. ; name: chicken wings in honey bbq sauce ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt and black pepper, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce, oil, garlic cloves ; preparation:Cut off and discard wing. Cut each wing at joint to make two sections. Season wings with salt and pepper, to taste. Place wings on broiler pan and broil about 6 inches from heat for 10 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer wings to slow cooker. Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. Pour over chicken wings. Cover and place slow cooker on high for 2 hour or low for 4 hours. ; name: cherry cake apparently for two ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, eggs, almond extract, flour, baking powder, ground almonds, red glazed cherries ; preparation:

name: easy krab egg rolls baked low fat ; ingredients: egg roll wraps, imitation crabmeat, cabbage and carrot coleslaw mix, onion, sesame oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except egg roll wrappers. Place wrappers in a wet paper towel. Keep them covered as you work with them. Spray a 15 x 10 jelly roll pan with cooking spray. Place a wrapper on work surface laying in a diamond shape. Place about 2 t of mixture in center of wrapper. Fold top point to middle, then fold side points in. Roll from top to bottom, place seam side down on prepared pan. Continue in this manner till you run out of filling or wrappers. Spray tops with cooking spray. Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: linguine with green onions ; ingredients: linguine, green onion, butter, dark sesame oil, low sodium soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Cook linguine just until done. Trim green onions and cut lengthwise into long thin threads, including green tops. While noodles are cooking, heat butter and sesame oil in a large skillet. Stir in green onions. Cook for 1 minute or until onions are wilted. Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic powder. Add drained pasta, toss well and serve. ; name: shrimp cheese broil ; ingredients: melba toast, small shrimp, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, onions, sesame seeds ; preparation:Place shrimp on each round. Combine mayo, cheese & onions. Spoon mixture over shrimp. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Place canapes on cookie sheet & broil until golden brown & bubbly. Serve hot. ; name: shred s sparkling vodka gimlet ; ingredients: vodka, sweetened lime juice, fresh lime juice, seltzer water, lime wedge ; preparation:Put a 6 ounce martini glass in the freezer to chill. Combine all ingredients except the seltzer into a shaker with ice and shake well for 15-20 seconds. Pour into chilled glass. Add seltzer. Garnish with lime wedge. Drink and be merry. ; name: vegan cornbread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, cornmeal, baking powder, maple syrup, soymilk, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Grease muffin cups or a square pan. Put dry ingredients in one bowl, and mix them. Put oil and milk together, and add to dry. Stir til just moist. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: chicken bites with spice ; ingredients: ground chicken, fresh breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c. Place minced chicken, breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger and egg in a food processor and pulse to combine. Divide chicken mixture into 12 equal pieces and with wet hands shape into neat ovals. Place bites on a lightly oiled baking sheet and refrigerate for 10 minutes. Bake chicken bites for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot or cold. ; name: scrunchy apple pie ; ingredients: pie apples, ground cinnamon, caster sugar, phyllo pastry, olive oil flavored cooking spray, icing sugar, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c fan forced. Combine apples, cinnamon and sugar in a bowl and spoon mixture into a rectangular ceramic baking dish. Place fillo on a clean work surface and lightly spray one filo sheet with olive oil spray. Fold each in half crossway and scrunch into a rosette sheape. Place on the apple mixture, repeating with remaining fillo. Lightly spray the pastry again. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Dust with icing sugar and. Cut and serve with cream or i think custard would work well too. ; name: tater tot green bean surprise ; ingredients: frozen tater tots, ground turkey, cut green beans, condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: cornflake ranch chicken fingers or breasts ; ingredients: chicken tenders, fat free ranch dressing, skim milk, hot sauce, corn flake crumbs, garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, salt and pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Mix dressing, milk and hot sauce. Pour over chicken in sealed container. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes longer if you have time. When ready to cook, preheat oven to 350f spray nonstick pan with cooking spray, set aside. Mix crumbs and spices. Dredge chicken in crumb mixture shaking off excess. Place chicken on prepared pan and place in oven for 15 to 20 mins or till 160f. Serve with your favorite dippers. ; name: juanita roberts blueberry cake ; ingredients: sugar, egg, butter, flour, baking soda, salt, vanilla, sour milk, blueberries ; preparation:Cream sugar, egg and butter together until fluffy. Sift the flour, baking soda and salt together and gradually beat into the butter mixture along with the vanilla and milk. Beat cake batter until smooth. Stir in berries. Pour cake into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees fpr 45-60 minutes. ; name: chocolate chip pecan pie muffins ; ingredients: pecans, brown sugar, flour, eggs, butter, chocolate chips, sugar ; preparation:Combine pecans, brown sugar, flour and chocolate chips. Make a well in center of mixture. Beat eggs until foamy. Stir together eggs and butter. Add to dry ingredients. Stir until moistened. Spoon batter into cups, makes 4 large muffins, or 6 smaller muffins. Mix topping ingredients together. Sprinkle on top of each muffin. Bake at 350f 20-25 minutes. Remove from pan immediately. Serve warm. ; name: apple country chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, mayonnaise, orange juice, apple jelly, lemon juice, celery, apples, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, orange juice, apple jelly and lemon juice. Add cut chicken, celery and apples. Toss to coat all pieces. Season with salt and chill until ready to serve. Sprinkle with chopped walunts to garnish and add crunch. ; name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: tomato and crispy bacon fettuccini ; ingredients: dry fettuccine, lean bacon, green beans, yellow pepper, pasta sauce, dried basil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook fettuccini in a large saucepan of boiling water until dente and drain well. Heat a dash of oil in a frying pan and quickly cook the bacon pieces until crisp and golden, set aside. Add the beans and pepper to the pan and cook until tender. Pour in the pasta sauce, add the bacon and cook, stirring until hot. Toss through the well drained fettuccini with basil leaves. Serve with grated parmesan cheese on the side. ; name: jalapeno corn grits ; ingredients: butter, jalapeno, fresh corn kernels, onion, grits, water, fresh thyme, kosher salt, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Melt the butter in a medium saucepan. Add the jalapeno, corn and onion. Saute until the vegetables are tender. Stir in the grits. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Stir in the thyme and season with salt and pepper. ; name: smoky barbecue beef sandwiches ; ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, teriyaki sauce, chipotle chile in adobo, salt, hoagie rolls ; preparation:

name: dairy free sugar free chocolate mousse ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, coconut milk, egg yolks, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Cut chocolate into slivers with a large knife. Place in a large bowl. Mix coconut milk, egg yolks, stevia, and salt in a saucepan. Heat over medium until steaming. Do not boil. Cook for 15 minutes until thickened. Pour milk mixture through fine meshed sieve to remove lumps into chocolate. Let mixture sit for five minutes. Stir chocolate and milk mixture slowly and constantly until fully mixed. Add vanilla and mix inches. Pour into container such as a bowl or individual cups. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: cauliflower gratine gratin ; ingredients: cauliflower, condensed milk, milk, swiss cheese, buttered bread crumb, bacon ; preparation:Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water about 12 minutes, just until fork tender. Drain and place in shallow baking dish, combine soup, milk. Stir in cheese. Pour over cauliflower. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, until hot and bubbly. Ganish with bacon. ; name: cheesy bacon ranch hash browns casserole ; ingredients: shredded hash brown potatoes, onion, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, dry ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, mix cream of chicken soup, sour cream, bacon bits and ranch dressing mix. Add cheddar cheese, onions and hasbrowns. Place in greased 9x13 pan. Bake 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: italian marinated chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing, oregano, parmesan cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:In a glass 9 x 11 baking dish, place cleaned and trimmed chicken breasts, and season with salt and pepper, if desired. Pour italian salad dressing over to coat and let marinate in the fridge for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. After the hour of marinating, turn chicken breasts over and sprinkle evenly with oregano and grated parmesan cheese. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked. ; name: easy peasy beef stew ; ingredients: stewing beef, oil, onion soup mix, frozen mixed vegetables, juice ; preparation:Brown stewing beef in oil over medium heat. Set aside. Pour frozen vegetables into slow cooker. Add beef. Sprinkle soup mix into slow cooker. Add enough v8 juice to cover beef and veggies. Set cooker to low and cook for 6-7 hours. ; name: iowa stuffed pork chops with sweet apple dressing ; ingredients: pork chops, butter, water, apples, white bread, sugar, cinnamon, salt, raisins ; preparation:Cut 2 inch pockets into chops from bone side so dressing stays in. In bowl combine apples, bread, sugar, cinnamon and salt. Mix well. Stuff into pockets of pork chops. Place chops in a 9x13 baking dish. Pour melted butter or marg. Over chops and bake at 350. When chops have browned, add 1 cup of water and cover with foil. Bake for 2 hours. ; name: parmesan sage baked pork chops ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, sage, lemon peel, eggs, flour, salt & pepper, center-cut pork chops, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Mix breadcrumbs, cheese, sage and lemon peel in a pie plate or shallow bowl and set aside. Beat eggs in a medium bowl and set aside. Place flour on a plate and season with salt and pepper. Coat pork chops on both sides with flour. Dip pork chops into eggs, then coat on both sides with breadcrumb mixture. In heavy large ovenproof skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add pork chops to skillet and cook until golden brown. Place skillet into oven. Bake until pork chops are crisp on the outside and meat thermometer inserted into pork registers 150 f. ; name: simple chinese almond cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, almond extract, flour, baking soda, salt, sliced almonds, egg white, water ; preparation:

name: double wonderful french toast ; ingredients: white bread, sugar-free strawberry jam, egg, milk ; preparation:Spread jelly on one slice of bread. Use other slice to make a sandwhich. Break egg into a shallow bowl. Add milk and beat until blended. Turn jelly-sandwhich in egg mixture until all liquid is absorbed by both sides of the sandwhich. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat, and fy sandwhich until underside is golden brown. Flip over to 2nd side and repeat. ; name: lemon rosemary couscous ; ingredients: couscous, water, extra virgin olive oil, rosemary, lemon juice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Add all ingredients except cous cous to a sauce pan. Bring to boil, stirring occassionally. Allow to boil for 3 minutes. Stir in cous cous and remove from heat. Cover and let sit until tender, fluff with fork occassionally. Serve with a lemon slice and enjoy. ; name: julienne of carrots in honey glaze ; ingredients: carrot, unsalted butter, liquid honey, lemon juice, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Using vegetable peeler or food processor, shred carrots into long strands. In pot of boiling salted water, cook carrots for 1-2 minutes or until barely tender. Drain and refresh under cold running water and drain again. In skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in honey and lemon juice and mix well. Add carrots. Stir and toss 2-3 minutes or until carrots are heated through and well coated. Season with pepper and nutmeg to taste. ; name: grilled ham cheese quesadillas ; ingredients: tortillas, dijon mustard, ham, sweet green pepper, cheddar cheese, green onion, jalapeno, salsa ; preparation:Lay the tortilla on a work surface, spread it with the mustard. Lay the ham on top to cover the whole tortilla. On one side of the tortilla lay the peppers, sharp cheddar and sprinkle the chopped green onion and jalepeno over. Fold the tortilla in half. Have the grill very hot, lay the folded quesadilla on the grill and press it down. Grill for about 6 or 8 minutes until the cheese melts, then flip it and grill the other side. Use a panni press if available and no need to flip. Remove to plate and slice in half. Spread half the salsa on each tortilla half. ; name: scones biscuits in usa with vanilla bean and mango jam ; ingredients: self raising flour, caster sugar, salt, milk, cream, mango, white sugar, lemon, vanilla bean ; preparation:Vanilla bean and mango jam - combine all the ingredients in a heatproof microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered for 8 to 10 minutes or until thick and jam like. For scones - preheat oven to 230c fan forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine flour, sugar and salt in a bowl, add milk and cream and stir with a knife until dough comes together. Knead lightly on floured surface until dough comes together and is smooth. Gently press out to a 3cm thick round. Cut into scones and place on baking tray. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve hot with butter and jam. ; name: homemade soft taco shells ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, salt, egg, cold water ; preparation:Combine all ingredients and beat until smooth. Fry slowly on a griddle or in large frypan in small amounts of cooking oil. Using a ladle, pour and swirl into a desired size circle. Let fry until the top is dry, then flip for a minute or so to set the other side. If they turn out like crepes, make the shells thicker. Fill with your favorite ingredients. We use seasoned hamburger, tomato, onion, lettuce, cheese, green peppers, olives. ; name: tex mex carnitas ; ingredients: pork roast, taco seasoning, water, green chilies, flour tortillas ; preparation:Cook pork roast 3 hours at 325. Cool. Shred meat, discarding any fat. Place shredded meat, taco seasoning, water and green chilies in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 2 hours. When ready to serve, steam tortillas to soften. Place a generous portion of shredded pork mixture on each tortilla and fold over. May be served with refried beans, guacamole, shredded lettus, shredded cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, picante sauce, or any other garnish of your choice. ; name: tomato basil strata ; ingredients: bread, tomatoes, green onion, mozzarella cheese, eggs, milk, butter, basil, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: five lily soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, leeks, shallots, garlic, green onions, vegetable stock, soy sauce, molasses, salt ; preparation:Saute onion and leeks in olive oil until soft. Add shallots, garlic and green onions and cook slowly for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are soft, cooked down and browned. Add stock, soy sauce and molasses. Scrape up browned bits, bring to a boil, then turn down heat and simmer partly covered for 30 minutes. If not a vegan meal, this soup can be served with garlic bread croutons with melted cheese. ; name: chili noodle casserole ; ingredients: egg noodles, cream cheese, sour cream, kosher salt, black pepper, chili, cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f begin cooking noodles according to package directions. Have cream cheese and sour cream ready. Remove noodles from heat, drain in collander, and return directly to pot. Add cream cheese, sour cream, salt, and black pepper. Stirr thoroughly, mixing well. Lightly grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the noodle mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: simple chinese noodles ; ingredients: fried chinese noodles, ginger, green onions, oil, oyster sauce, soya sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this. ; name: homemade english ale mustard with garlic ; ingredients: yellow mustard seeds, garlic cloves, plain flour, fine sea salt, ale ; preparation:Grind the mustard seeds to a smooth powder using either an electric spice grinder or a coffee grinder. Transfer the ground seeds to a bowl and add the flour, crushed garlic and salt. Gradually whisk in the ale until it takes on a smooth, creamy consistency. Spoon the mustard into sterilised jam jars and secure with well-fitting lids. Leave to mature for at least 2 weeks in a cool place before tasting. ; name: creamy peach pie ; ingredients: peach jell-o, boiling water, peach ice cream, water, instant vanilla pudding, non-dairy whipped topping, 8-inch baked pie shell ; preparation:Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add ice cream and stir until melted. Combine milk and pudding mix in small mixer bowl. Beat at low speed for 2 minutes. Add gelatin mixture. Whip until fluffy. Fold in non-dairy whipped topping. Spoon into pie shell. Chill about 2 hours. Garnish with additional whipped topping and peach slices. ; name: ed s south of the border marinated shrimp ; ingredients: fresh shrimp, limes, red onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh jalapenos, cilantro, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring a large pot of heavily salted water to boil and add the shrimp. Bring to a boil again and cook for 3 minutes. Drain the shrimp and rinse to stop the cooking. Peel as soon as the shrimp are cool enough to handle. Mince the onion, garlic, and jalapenos, chop the cilantro and add to the olive oil in a large bowl. Squeeze the limes and add to the bowl along with the shrimp and sugar, salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for a few hours. Serve with toothpicks and plenty of napkins. ; name: duchess potatoes ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, butter, salt, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f and butter a baking dish. Combine the mashed potatoes, butter and salt with the beaten egg yolks. Pipe into balls, hearts, or other shapes using a pastry bag. Place in dish and brush with slightly beaten egg whites. Brown in oven. ; name: lemon wild rice salad ; ingredients: rice pilaf mix, marinated artichokes, tomatoes, red bell pepper, parsley, capers, lemons, rind of, lemon juice, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: butterscotch cashew bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, butterscotch chips, sweetened condensed milk, salted cashew halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: calabicitas squash casserole ; ingredients: oil, garlic clove, onion, zucchini, corn, green chilies, salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large heavy skillet, saute the onion, garlic, and zucchini in oil. Discard the garlic. Mix in drained corn, chopped chiles, and salt. Cover tightly and heat through. Mix in cheese and serve. There is also another way to use above ingredients but with a little flour and a cup of either canned or whole milk added to the mixture. Sprinkle with breadcrumbs and bake. 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes. I like this one best. ; name: crock pot mexican chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, black beans, rotel, black olives, corn, salsa, onion, garlic cloves, sea salt ; preparation:Place frozen chicken breasts in crock pot. Add all other ingredients. Cook on high for 5-6 hours. Remove chicken and shred with two forks. Return chicken to crock pot, reduce to low, and cook for 1-2 hours. ; name: authentic polish cucumber salad mizeria ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, pepper, sour cream, cider vinegar, dill ; preparation:Place cucumbers in a medium bowl.
