Can also be frozen. ; name: chicken saffron risotto low fat ; ingredients: arborio rice, chicken stock, chicken breasts, leek, saffron strands, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: impressive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, fresh parsley, cheese, milk, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies. ; name: vegetarian mushroom gravy ; ingredients: vegetable oil, mushroom, tamari soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper, hot water, cornstarch ; preparation:Saut mushrooms, tamari and black pepper in oil until mushrooms are tender. Add water and bring to a boil. Slowly add cornstarch and cook at a low boil, continuing to stir until the gravy is thick and clear. Adjust seasoning as necessary. Serve. ; name: sensible linguine alfredo ; ingredients: water, all-purpose flour, garlic cloves, low-sodium instant chicken bouillon granules, ground black pepper, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese, plain low-fat yogurt, fresh linguine, fresh parsley ; preparation:Combine water, flour, garlic, bouillon, pepper and nutmeg in large, nonstick skillet. Stir until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, for 8 to 10 minutes or until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Stir in cheese and yogurt. Prepare pasta according to package directions. Add pasta to skillet. Toss to coat. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: brenda s hidden valley ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, louisiana hot sauce, vinegar, hidden valley ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Put wings, hot sauce and vinegar in a large bowl. Toss together. Marinate for at least 30 minutes. While marinating heat oven to 400f. Line jelly roll pan with parchment paper or foil. Lay marinated wings, skin side up on shallow pan. Sprinkle with the dressing mix. Bake for 40 minutes or until done. The more crowded the wings are, the juicier they are. The more separated the wings are, the crispier they are. Drain wings on paper towels, then place in serving dish. Either keep warm or place in fridge and heat at a later time. ; name: easy peanut blossoms ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, smooth peanut butter, biscuit mix, vanilla extract, white sugar, hershey chocolate kiss ; preparation:Mix milk and peanut butter until smooth. Add biscuit mix and vanilla. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll in sugar. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased pan. Bake at 375 degrees for 6-8 minutes or until light brown. While cookies are baking, unwrap hersheys. Press kisses into center as soon as cookies are out of oven. ; name: sweet corn pancakes ; ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, sour cream, flour, baking soda, baking powder, corn, vegetable oil ; preparation:Beat the egg whites until they hold soft peaks when the beaters are lifted up. In another bowl, combine the egg yolks, half-and-half, and sour cream. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg yolk mixture. Add the beaten egg whites, using a gentle stirring motion to combine them with the yolk mixture. Add the corn and stir gently. Pour a small amount of oil into a non-stick pan and heat it over medium heat. Drop batter, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into the pan for each pancake and cook until golden brown on each side. Serve with butter if desired. ; name: kittencal s mediterranean style taverna chopped greek salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, roma tomatoes, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, artichoke heart, red onion, kalamata olive, feta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, dried oregano ; preparation:In a large bowl toss together cucumbers, roma tomatoes, diced sun-dried tomatoes, 2 tablespoons of the sun-dried tomato oil, artichokes, and the red onion and olives. Toss to combine. In a small bowl whisk together the olive oil with a small amount of red wine vinegar drizzle over the salad. Season with salt and lots fresh ground black pepper to taste. Chill until ready to serve. Just before serving sprinkle the feta cheese on top of the salad, then prinkle a small amount of dried oregano on top of the feta if desired. ; name: chicken and cheese pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: simple and delicious meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, carrot, mushrooms, celery, onion, bread, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Individually process carrot, mushroom, celery, and onion in a food processor until pieces are ground fine. Add to mixing bowl. Process three slices bread into crumbs and add to bowl. Add ground beef, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and eggs. Combine well with hands. Form into loaf on a cookie sheet. Bake for 1 hour - 1 hour 20 minutes. Let cool for 15 to an hour. You can serve this right away or cut into thick slices and fry on the stove top for an extra crunchy-licious crust. ; name: bananaberry bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, buttermilk, flour, baking soda, salt, blueberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing. ; name: shrimp cheese broil ; ingredients: melba toast, small shrimp, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, onions, sesame seeds ; preparation:Place shrimp on each round. Combine mayo, cheese & onions. Spoon mixture over shrimp. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Place canapes on cookie sheet & broil until golden brown & bubbly. Serve hot. ; name: chipotle corn muffins ; ingredients: baking soda, baking powder, salt, yellow cornmeal, eggs, plain yogurt, oil, chipotle chiles in adobo, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 425 degrees. Spray muffin tins lightly with oil. Mix together baking soda, baking powder, salt, and cornmeal in a small bowl. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs with yogurt. Stir in the chipotles& cheese. Then gently stir the egg mix into the cornmeal mix just until combined. Fill the muffin tins with the batter& bake for 10-15 minutes for regular sized muffins or 7-10 minutes for mini-muffins. ; name: baked hoisin sauce chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, honey, hoisin sauce, warm water, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, scallion, fresh ginger ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Marinate chicken wings for 15 minutes in a mixture of honey, hoisin sauce, water, salt, pepper, garlic, scallion, and ginger. Place chicken wings on a baking pan line with alum foil and bake for 30 minutes, brushing occasionally with marinade. Turn oven to broil and broil chicken wings five more minutes. Turn wings every two minutes to avoid burning. To serve, transfer chicken wings to a serving platter and serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: popcorn twist caramel corn ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, popcorn ; preparation:Prehead oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large sauce pan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart. ; name: cherry chicken salad sandwich ; ingredients: cooked chicken, dried cherries, pecans, green onions, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, lemon juice, fresh ground black pepper, lettuce leaf, plain croissants ; preparation:Combine chicken, cherries, pecans, and onion in a bowl. Mix mayo, yogurt, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Toss to mix. Refrigerate salad for 1-2 hours. Split croissants and divide chicken evenly. Sprinkle with black pepper before serving. ; name: easy lemon sponge cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, lemon juice, lemon, rind of ; preparation:

name: lemon dill trout ; ingredients: whole trout, lemon slices, dill, rosemary, olive oil, kosher salt, aluminum foil, dry white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drizzle foil with oil and sprinkle with kosher salt. Place fish on center of foil and sprinkle with dill. Place lemon slices inside fish and rosemary on top. Salt to taste. Fold up edges of foil and add wine. Seal foil pouch and place in oven on 350 for 12 minutes. ; name: asparagus with fresh tomato yogurt sauce ; ingredients: asparagus, plain yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, diced tomato, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Cut asparagus in 2 or 3 pieces. Cook in boiling salted water until just tender but still bright green drain and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking process. Pat dry with paper towels. While asparagus is cooking, combine the yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, tomatoes, salt and fresh ground pepper. Place the asparagus on a flat plate and spoon the sauce across the center. Serve at room temperature. ; name: cinnamon chocolate sherbet ; ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, water, evaporated milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:In saucepan, mix cocoa, sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Whisk in the water. Bring to a boil. Continue whisking to break up lumps and prevent burning. Reduce heat and simmer 2-3 minutes, until sugar is completely dissolved. Remove from heat add the milk and vanilla. Let cool. When the mixture reaches room temperature, pour in ice-cream maker. Freeze according to directions. ; name: cabbage noodle salad ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, apple cider vinegar, splenda sugar substitute, fresh ground black pepper, low sodium soy sauce, green cabbage, green onions, carrot, ramen noodles ; preparation:Make dressing by combining ingredients in a large bowl. Combine the first three salad ingredients, toss well. Add crushed ramen noodles and dressing to salad and toss again. Serve right away or cover and refrigerate to allow the flavors to blend. I also nearly doubled the dressing ingredients. ; name: mary s skillet cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:In a mixing bowl. Stir corn meal, flour, soda, salt sugar into pea size shapes. In a 450 degree oven in a heavy skillet heat butter till melted and sizzling but not brown. Meanwhile add egg and buttermilk to dry ingredients beat until completely combined. Stir in butter and pour into hot skillet until golden brown and bake for 20-25 minute. ; name: president reagan s favorite macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, butter, egg, salt, dry mustard, sharp cheddar cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil macaroni in water until tender and drain thoroughly. Stir in butter and egg. Mix mustard and salt with 1t hot water, and add to milk. Add cheese, leaving enough to sprinkle on top. Pour into buttered casserole. Add milk, sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 350f for about 45 minutes or until custard is set and top is crusty. ; name: the best creamed onions ; ingredients: onions, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, white pepper, milk ; preparation:In lg skillet or dutch oven, saute onions in butter until tender and golden brown, about 25 minute remove with a slotted spoon. Add flour, salt and pepper to skillet. Stir until smooth. Gradually stir in milk until blended. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 min or until thickened. Reduce heat to med. Return onions to the pan. Heat through. ; name: super suppers beef and noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, ground beef, onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: 7 layer cookies ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, shredded coconut, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts ; preparation:Melt 1 stick butter in a jelly roll pan. Spread in pan - 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs. 1 cup of shredded coconut. 6 oz of butterscotch chips. 6 oz. Of chocolate chips. Drizzle one can of sweet condensed milk on top. Add 1 cup of chopped walnuts on top. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. Remove and let cool and then cut into squares. ; name: chili rub for pork ; ingredients: pork chops, brown sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Trim fat and slash edges at 1 inch intervals. In bowl, combine dry ingredients. Stir in oil. Rub all over chops. Grease grill and cook until juices run clear. Approx 8 minutes. ; name: spaghetti with tomatoes and pecorino romano cheese ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, red onion, thyme, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, water, salt, pepper, pecorino romano cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, saute onion and thyme in half of the olive oil over low heat for 12 minutes. Add cherry tomatoes and water and simmer for 8 minutes. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Drain pasta and toss with the sauce. Add cheese and remaining olive oil and toss again. ; name: best ever low fat custard ice cream ; ingredients: fat-free sweetened condensed milk, fat-free evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, flour, salt, vanilla flavoring, skim milk ; preparation:Put eggs, sugar, flour, and part of milk in blender. Blend well. Add remaining ingredients. Cook on low heat until the mixture thickens slightly. Cool and refrigerate until you are ready to churn. ; name: pumpkin fudge ; ingredients: milk, sugar, light corn syrup, pumpkin, salt, cinnamon, allspice, margarine, vanilla ; preparation:Combine the first 5 ingredients in a heavy pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. When it comes to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, reduce heat and simmer until it comes to the softball stage or 236f on a candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, allspice, margarine, and vanilla. Cool, then beat until thick and mixture looses its gloss. Pour into buttered square dish and let cool before cutting. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: vegan style rotkohl german red cabbage ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, red cabbage, tart apple, whole cloves, bay leaves, kosher salt, ground black pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Gently heat the oil in a large heavy-bottom saucepan, and stir-fry the onions until transparent. Add the cabbage and stir well. Add the remaining ingredients and stir again. Cover and simmer over low heat for 1 hour, or until cabbage is tender. If possible, remove the whole cloves before serving. ; name: noodles herbs ; ingredients: egg noodles, thyme leaves, basil leaves, parsley, chives, butter ; preparation:

name: short cut apple yam casserole ; ingredients: apple pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, brown sugar, yams ; preparation:Cut apples in the pie filling into bite-sized pieces. In a medium bowl, mix the pie filling, cinnamon, and brown sugar until well blended. Gently stir in the cut-up yams. Grease a two-quart casserole dish and pour in apple-yam mixture. You may either microwave for approx 8-10 minutes until warmed through or you can put it into a 350f oven and bake approximately 15 minutes until warmed. ; name: broiled pineapple bagel ; ingredients: bagel, cream cheese, cinnamon, sugar, canned pineapple ; preparation:Combine the sugar and cinnamon together in small bowl. Split the bagel. Spread each half of the bagel with 1 tbsp cream cheese, and top with pineapple slice. Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture. Broil 1 minute. ; name: filipino fish adobo ; ingredients: trout fillets, garlic, apple cider vinegar, water, salt, fresh ground black pepper, bay leaf, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a saucepan, except oil. Marinate for one hour. On stovetop, bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove fish and set aside. Boil sauce until reduced to half and set aside. Heat oil in frying pan and fry fish until browned. Pour sauce in with fish and simmer for 3 minutes. Serve hot with sticky rice. ; name: simple cabbage and mushroom side ; ingredients: butter, rindless bacon, mushrooms, cabbage, spring onion, black pepper ; preparation:Chop bacon, slice mushrooms and shred cabbage. Slice spring onion if using. Set aside. Heat butter on medium heat in a large fry pan. Add bacon and mushrooms and cook for 1 minute. Add the cabbage and cook for a further 4 or 5 minutes until wilted. Stir in spring onion, if using, and season with black pepper. ; name: breakfast gravy for biscuits ; ingredients: breakfast sausage, flour, milk, buttermilk, black peppercorns, salt ; preparation:Brown sausage and break up into bite size pieces. Cook until fully done. Add flour to the sausage and grease and cook until it has a pasty consistency. Add milk very slowly to sausage making sure to mix well and avoid lumps. Cook on medium heat stirring occasionally until it is a thick gravy. Finally add buttermilk pepper and salt to taste. Let the gravy once again thicken for about 5 minutes on medium heat. Serve hot over fresh baked biscuits. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: potato soup with ham and cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, water, ham, milk, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, butter, flour ; preparation:Boil potatoes until tender enough to eat but not to soft. Drain potatoes and reserve the liquid. In a large pot melt butter. When the butter is melted add the flour and whisk to combine until smooth. Add the milk whisking to combine until smooth. Add 2 cups of the potato cooking water. Add the ham and cook for 5 minutes. Add the cheese and stir till melted. Add the potatoes, salt, pepper, and red pepper. Place on the lowest heat and let set for 5 to 10 minutes for the flavors to blend. Serve with crusty bread and maybe a salad. ; name: cinnamon crackers ; ingredients: flax seed meal, almond flour, splenda granular, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: lemon chili chicken with penne ; ingredients: penne, boneless skinless chicken breast half, olive oil, onion, garlic, bottled lemon juice, tomatoes, water, red pepper flakes, cilantro ; preparation:In large pot, cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in large skillet, brown chicken in oil with onion and garlic. Add lemon juice, tomatoes, water and red pepper flakes. Cook 2 to 3 minutes. Add penne. Heat through. Garnish with cilantro. Serve hot or cold. ; name: fresh fig compote ; ingredients: sugar, water, orange juice, orange zest, fresh figs, curacao ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the sugar, water, orange juice, and orance zest. Stir to combine. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the figs and cook for about 2 minutes or until soft, turn once. Add curacao and stir to mix. Cool and serve in sherbert dishes. ; name: halibut italiano ; ingredients: halibut fillets, spaghetti sauce, sliced mushrooms, olive, mozzarella cheese, olive oil ; preparation:Place fish in oiled baking pan. Top with mushrooms and olives. Pour spaghetti sauce over the top and bake for 10 minutes at 400 degrees. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 more minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with chopped parsley over the top and a lemon wedge on the side. ; name: orange glazed chicken wings ; ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken wings, sugar-free orange marmalade, dijon mustard, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add wing pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone. ; name: ravioli with brown butter and sage sauce ; ingredients: butter, dried sage, salt, pepper, cheese ravioli ; preparation:Cook ravioli as directed, drain and set aside. In medium frying pan over medium high heat, melt the butter. Cook until it becomes golden brown, about 2 - 3 minutes. Do not let it scorch. Add the sage, salt and pepper and mix for a few seconds. Add cooked ravioli, toss to coat. Serve hot. ; name: pomanders ; ingredients: navel oranges, whole cloves, ribbon, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Use a push pin or darning needle to make holes in rind of orange. Insert a whole clove into each hole. Cover the whole fruit with cloves, or make a spiral, stripe, diamond or checkerboard pattern. Roll in cinnamon if desired. Tie a ribbon around the pomander and knot it securely. Then tie a bow. Or to hang the pomander on a tree, use a heavy duty paper clip and open one end enough to pull a knotted ribbon through. Use the paper clip tohang the pomander over a branch. Can be made ahead. The more cloves used, the longer the pomander will keep. ; name: peach sauce for the microwave fat free ; ingredients: water, white sugar, molasses, lemon juice, vanilla, fresh peaches ; preparation:Peel, pit, and slice the peaches. In a microwave safe dish with a lid, mix all the ingredients but the peaches. Microwave on high for 6 minutes or until boiling. Add the peaches and let it sit. Serve cold. ; name: sweet bbq chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thigh, honey, garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: pumpkin spice spread ; ingredients: fat free cream cheese, cooked pumpkin, sugar substitute, cinnamon, maple flavoring, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, nutmeg, reduced-calorie whipped topping ; preparation:In large bowl, combine cream cheese, pumpkin and sugar sub, mix well. Beat in cinnamon, vanilla, maple flavoring, pumpkin pie spice and nutmeg. Fold in whipped topping. Refrigerate till serving time. This is good used as a spread on cinnamon bagels, toast or any quick bread you like. ; name: savoy slaw with sesame dressing ; ingredients: savoy cabbage, red bell pepper, sesame seeds, toasted sesame oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a small skillet, toast sesame seeds, shaking the pan occasionally until seeds are golden, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat. In a large bowl, combine cabbage, bell pepper, sesame oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Add sesame seeds and toss. Serve at room temperature. ; name: soup with mixed pastas ; ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, bay leaves, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, boneless chicken breast, olive oil, pasta ; preparation:In a large saucepan bring chicken broth and water to a boil. Add bay leaves, onions, carrot and garlic. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered 10 minutes. In a skillet cook and stir chicken in hot oil for 3 minutes or until cooked through. Add chicken, pastas, and sage to soup. Simmer, uncovered for 8 to 10 minutes or until larger pieces of pasta are tender but slightly firm. Remove the bay leaves. ; name: cornbread taco pizza ; ingredients: corn muffin mix, ground beef, taco seasoning mix, salsa, cheddar cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Prepare corn muffin mix as directed on box. Spread batter into lightly greased 12 inch pizza pan. Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes until slightly brown. In a skillet brown ground meat. Drain and add seasoning. Put salsa then meat on baked cornbread. Top with cheese. Put back into oven until topping is bubbly and cheese is melted. Top with sour cream if you please. ; name: easy tasty baked chicken ; ingredients: chicken, garlic powder, seasoning salt, pepper, paprika, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil ; preparation:In a baking dish arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer. ; name: amalou almond honey butter ; ingredients: almonds, walnut oil, salt, honey ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spread almonds onto a baking sheet in a single layer. Roast about 10 to 15 minutes, until slightly browned, tossing a couple of times for even browning. Let cool to touch. In a blender, mix or pulse the almonds with the walnut oil and salt. This can take about 10 minutes or so. Once smooth, spoon in honey and blend for 30 seconds to mix thoroughly. ; name: breakfast fruit bowl ; ingredients: peaches, pineapple chunks, pears, grapefruit sections, mandarin segment, maraschino cherries, reserved juices, cornflour, sugar ; preparation:Cut peach slices and grapefruit segments in half, place in bowl. Add pineapple chunks, quartered pears, and mandarins. Add cherries and toss. Stir reserved juices, cornflour and sugar in saucepan. Heat and stir until it boils and thickens. Cool. Stir into fruit. Serve and enjoy. ; name: chic broc chee rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, onion, butter, instant rice, cream of chicken soup, milk, garlic salt, pepper, provolone cheese ; preparation:

name: spicy peanut coconut shrimp ; ingredients: shredded coconut, dark sesame oil, large shrimp, red pepper flakes, fresh cilantro, roasted peanuts, lime wedge ; preparation:Roast the coconut in a small nonstick skillet over medium-high heat 2-3 minutes until golden, stirring constantly. Immediately remove from skillet. Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and red pepper flakes. Stir-fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoons toasted coconut and 1 tablespoons chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges. ; name: cream cheese dip for the lazy ; ingredients: cream cheese, tomatoes, garlic, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Slice tomato in half and scoop out inside pulp. Combine tomato pulp with cream cheese and garlic. Mix with a mixer for several minutes until smooth. Place mixture in a small bowl and sprinkle with fresh ground pepper. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: scrambled egg with smoked salmon ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, basil leaves, smoked salmon, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Warm a pan and add the butter to coat it. Mix the egg and milk and pour into pan. Cooking on a warm to medium heat gently stir the eggs until almost ready for serving. When the mixture is still a little runny add the salmon and chopped basil. Cook for another minute so the salmon just starts to change colour. Serve on freshly toasted bread. Spinkle a little extra basil over. If you have any left also garnish with a twist of salmon. Eat at once. ; name: oriental wrap quick ; ingredients: chicken rice pilaf mix, oil, ginger, garlic, sliced mushrooms, tortillas, lettuce leaf, chicken, green onion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Prepare rice mix according to package directions. While rice is cooking, heat oil in a small frypan. Saute ginger, garlic and mushrooms until tender. Fold into rice mixture. Lay tortilla flat and line with letuce leaves. Divide rice veggie mixture into 4 equal parts. Spreading on top of lettuce. Lay chicken strips and green onions on top of rice. Sprinkle with soy sauce. Wrap tortilla ends in and roll up. Serve immediately with a ginger conserve or your favourite fresh veggie salsa topping. ; name: coffee mousse ; ingredients: instant coffee, unflavored gelatin, water, boiling water, cream cheese spread, sugar, whipping cream, eggs, coffee beans ; preparation:Mix coffee granules, gelatine and room temperature water in small bowl until well blended. Add boiling water. Stir at least 1 minute or until gelatine is completely dissolved. Cool to room temperature. Beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Gradually add cream, beating until well blended. Add eggs. Beat just until blended. Gently stir in coffee mixture. Pour evenly into 6 dessert dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until set. Top each with coffee bean just before serving. ; name: chinese steak crock pot ; ingredients: onion, olive oil, top sirloin steaks, ground pepper, garlic salt, beef broth, onion soup mix, diced tomatoes, five-spice powder ; preparation:Slice onion and put on bottom of crock pot. Season the steak with pepper and garlic salt. Heat the oil in a skillet and lightly brown the steak. When done, place steak on onions in crock pot. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over top of steak. Cook 4-6 hours depending on your crock pot or until steak is tender. Serve over noodles or rice. ; name: pineapple cherry freeze ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, almond extract, cherry pie filling, crushed pineapple, whipped topping ; preparation:Combine milk, lemon juice and extract. Mix well. Stir in pie filling and pineapple. Fold in whipped topping. Freeze. ; name: red skin potato and dill salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, fresh dill, celery, onion, garlic, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: hawaii burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey breast, ground ginger, low sodium soy sauce, garlic cloves, green onions, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, pineapple ; preparation:Mix turkey with ginger, soy sauce, garlic and onions. Form into patties and cook for 5 minutes on each side on grill. As burgers cook, baste with hoisin mixed with sesame oil. Grill pineapple rings alongside burgers. Place burgers on buns and top with grilled pineapple rings and lettuce. ; name: pasta arrabbiata ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, whole canned tomatoes, sugar, tomato sauce, dry white wine, oregano, basil, pasta ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta in boiling water until just al dente. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook until fragrant. Add remaining ingredients except pasta. Simmer about 10 minutes. Drain pasta. Add to sauce and cook, stirring, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and serve. ; name: cactus mexican style ; ingredients: cactus pieces, tomatoes, white onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, monterey jack cheese, salt, corn oil ; preparation:Steam the cactus until softened. Drain the cactus. Fry all the ingredients except for the monterrey cheese. Combine fried ingredients with the cactus and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Top with cheese before serving. ; name: reuben s creamed corn ; ingredients: half-and-half, chicken bouillon cubes, white pepper, sugar, frozen corn, butter, flour, parsley ; preparation:Blend together half and half, chicken bouillon cubes, pepper and sugar in saucepan. Bring to boil. Add corn to boiling liquid. Return to boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 3-5 minutes. Melt butter in separate small saucepan. Add flour and cook, stirring constantly until paste is formed. Add flour mixture to corn mixture and stir with wooden spoon to mix well. Bring to boil, stirring frequently, until thickened. Remove from heat. Sprinkle lightly with chopped parsley if desired. ; name: barbecued black eyed peas ; ingredients: bacon, celery, onion, carrot, black-eyed peas, prepared mustard, barbecue sauce, green pepper, potato chips, liquid ; preparation:Soak the black eyes in water overnight. Next day add 1 tsp salt and gently boil for about 30 minutes. Dice the bacon and fry until crisp. Remove from pan. In the hot bacon fat, cook the onion, celery and carrot until thoroughly heated. Add the black eyes, liquid, bbq sauce and mustard. Gently mix. Simmer for 15 minutes, adding more liquid if needed. Just before serving, stir in the green pepper and crushed potato chips. Serve topped with the bacon. ; name: spicy hot cole slaw ; ingredients: cabbage, green pepper, red pepper, onion, salt, sugar, oil, vinegar, cold water, jalapenos ; preparation:Dice cabbage, green pepper, red pepper, jalapenos, and onion. Place in large bowl. In small bowl mix together salt, sugar, oil, vinegar, and water. Mix well. Pour over cabbage, peppers, and onions and mix thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Before serving, mix well. ; name: cauldron cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, flour, pecans ; preparation:Cream the butter in a large cast-iron cauldron. Gradually add the brown sugar, beating well. Add the eggs, lemon juice, and zest and then beat by hand or with an electric mixer until the mixture is well blended. The next step is to stir in the flour and pecans. Cover the cauldron with a lid, aluminum foil, or plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight. When ready, shape the dough into one-inch balls and place them about three inches apart on greased cookie sheets. Bake in a 375 preheated oven for approximately 8 minutes. Remove from the oven and place on wire racks until completely cool. ; name: hot white bean salad ; ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, white beans, fresh parsley, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: cuban garlic sauce mojo cubano ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, sour orange juice, oregano, salt, black pepper ; preparation:For the mojo, you will need a large bowl. In a large bowl, pour the sour orange juice or lime juice, oregano, salt, pepper, garlic and sliced onion into the bowl and stir. Heat the olive oil over medium-high for 2 minutes, then when hot, pour olive oil into bowl. Be careful not to get burned, since some of it might splatter out. Mix the mojo ingredients, then let sit for 30 minutes. ; name: luscious rhubarb sponge dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, golden brown sugar, water, flour, baking powder, sugar, butter, eggs, whole milk, whipping cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Butter 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Alternate adding milk in 2 additions and fold in flour in 3 additions. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipping cream. ; name: sauteed sirloin and mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless beef sirloin, herb seasoning mix, butter, beef broth, hoisin sauce, onion, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Cut steak into 4 servings-size pieces. Sprinkle with herb pepper or garlic pepper. In a 10-inch skillet cook steaks in hot butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or to desired doneness, turning once. Remove steak from pan. Cover and keep warm. For mushroom glaze, carefully add beef broth and hoisin, teriyaki, or worcestershire sauce to skillet. Cook until bubbly, scraping brown bits from bottom skillet. Stir in onoin wedges and sliced mushrooms. Cook over medium-high about 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender and the glaze is reduced to half its volume. Transfer warm steak to dinner plates and spoon glaze on steaks. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: bacon and egg quesadillas ; ingredients: unsalted butter, green onions, eggs, salt, pepper, crisp bacon, flour tortillas, monterey jack cheese, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a big nonstick skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Cook the onion, stirring, about 15 seconds. Add in the beaten eggs, salt and pepper to taste, and cook, stirring, until barely set. Stir in the bacon. Remove the pan from the heat. Put the tortillas on a flat surface and spoon half of the eggs on each tortilla. Top with equally with cheese. Fold tortillas in half. Brush lightly with oil. Wipe out the skillet and heat over medium heat. Toast the quesadillas until lightly browned on both sides, about 1 minute per side. Serve hot. ; name: herby garlic boursin ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, garlic cloves, lemon juice, oregano, parsley, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Cream together the cream cheese, butter and garlic. Add the lemon juice and stir to incorporate. Add oregano, parsley, cayenne and salt. Mix well. Refrigerate 2 hours to allow flavors to meld. Remove from fridge 30 minutes prior to serving. Serve with raw veggies or crackers. ; name: german green beans ; ingredients: bacon, onions, flour, sugar, salt, pepper, vinegar, green beans, bacon bits ; preparation:Fry the bacon in a large cast-iron skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels, leaving the fat in the pan. Add the onion and cook until light golden and tender, then add the flour and stir, cooking for about 1 minute. Add the sugar, salt, pepper, bean liquid or water, and vinegar, stir, and bring to a rolling boil. Allow to boil for about 3 minutes to thicken the sauce. Add the bacon bits at this time. Add the green beans and cook until heated through, about 7--8 minutes. Transfer the beans and sauce to a serving bowl and top with crumbled bacon. ; name: shiitake mushroom soup ; ingredients: shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, olive oil, chicken stock, water, soba noodles, spinach, soy sauce, lime juice ; preparation:

name: caramelized garlic chicken ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, brown sugar, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Heat oven to 500 degrees. Line shallow roasting pan with foil. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Heat oil in small nonstick skillet over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic. Cook 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic begins to soften. Remove from heat. Stir in brown sugar until well mixed. Place chicken breast halves in sprayed foil-lined pan. Spread garlic mixture evenly over chicken. Bake at 500 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear. ; name: smoked cheese gouda or alps potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, deli ham, smoked cheese, eggs, celery ribs, green onions, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt & pepper ; preparation:Mix first 6 ingredients together. Mix lemon juice, mayo and salt and pepper. Mix into salad. Chill for 1 hour. Enjoy. ; name: basil pesto lighter version ; ingredients: pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Add nuts and garlic to blender and pulse until minced. Add olive oil, pulse a few time more. Add basil leaves, cheese, salt and blend until smooth. Scrape sides of blender as you go to make sure everthing mixes well. Serve with your favorite pasta. ; name: gf cheeseburger pasta ; ingredients: onion, lean ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, water, ketchup, gluten-free pasta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef & onion. Use a large skillet for a single recipe, or a stock pot for a double recipe. Add other ingredients and heat to a boil. Cook over medium heat 10 to 20 minutes or until pasta is done, stirring often. Add cheese. Turn off heat and cover until cheese melts. Sauce will thicken a bit as it cools. Serve & enjoy. ; name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: sauce for a stir fry ; ingredients: water, chicken bouillon cube, soya sauce, cornstarch, ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Empty all ingredients in a mason jar and shake. If making just a veggie stirfry add sauce approximately 2 minutes before ready to serve. If adding meat or seafood, stir fry it first and then remove and set aside. When veggies are tender crisp, add sauce and meat or seafood and stir. Serve over rice. ; name: one pan banana bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, bananas, vanilla extract, eggs, bisquick baking mix, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease the bottom only of a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Stir all ingredients in pan with a fork until moistened. Beat vigorously 1 minute. Bake 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. Run knife around sides of loaf to loosen, remove from pan. Cool completely. ; name: sausage and summer squash ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, garlic cloves, polish sausage, summer squash, italian bread, oregano leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: frozen creamsicle cake ; ingredients: reduced-fat vanilla wafers, orange zest, unsalted butter, light corn syrup, orange sorbet, non-fat vanilla frozen yogurt ; preparation:Line loaf pan with a double layer of plastic wrap, allowing a few inches of overhang along sides. Stir together cookie crumbs, zest, butter, and corn syrup in a small bowl, then press into bottom of loaf pan. Spread sorbet evenly over crumb crust and freeze 30 minutes to harden. While sorbet is freezing, slightly soften frozen yogurt. Spread evenly over sorbet and freeze, covered with plastic wrap, until firm, at least 2 hours. Using plastic wrap as an aid, lift frozen cake out of pan, then peel off plastic. Let stand 5 minutes to soften, then cut crosswise into 4 slices. ; name: a simple harissa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, fresh parsley, hot paprika, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the tomatoes in half and gently wring out the seeds and liquid over the sink. Grate each tomato half on the coarse side of a grater into a bowl by holding the cut side of the tomato half against the grater and grating the flesh just to the skin. Discard the skin. Grate the onion into the bowl. Stir in the parsley, paprika, oil, and lemon juice, salt and black pepper to taste. The mixture should be highly seasoned. Serve immediately, or no longer than 4 hours after making, at room temperature. ; name: chocolate rum bananas ; ingredients: butter, semisweet chocolate, bananas, rum, sour cream ; preparation:Take 4 10-inch squares of aluminum foil and brush them with butter. Make a careful slit lengthwise in the peel of each banana, and open wide enough to place the chocolate pieces inside the bananas then close them up. Wrap each stuffed banana in the foil then barbecue over hot coals about 5-10 minutes or until the chocolate has melted inside the bananas. Remove from the bbq and place on individual serving plates. Pour some rum into each banana. Serve at once with sour cream mascarpone cheese, or ice cream, topped with nutmeg. ; name: beef and vegetable barley soup ; ingredients: chuck steaks, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, oregano, beef bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, carrots, barley ; preparation:Brown beef in oil in large pot. Stir in onion and garlic. Cook until onion is tender. Add water. Stir in oregano, bouillon and bay leaf. Bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer for an hour. Add barley and veggies. Turn heat to medium. Cook for 30 minutes. ; name: asparagus with lemon browned butter sauce ; ingredients: asparagus, butter, garlic clove, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper, thyme, lemon zest ; preparation:Snap off or trim ends from asparagus. Steam in a large pot of water or asparagus steamer for 3 to 5 minutes, or until crisp-tender. Drain and transfer to a medium bowl and keep warm. Melt butter in a medium skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until butter just begins to brown and foam, being careful not to burn. Remove from heat and stir in garlic. Swirl pan several times, then stir in lemon juice and vinegar. Pour over hot asparagus and season with salt and pepper. Toss gently to mix. Transfer to a platter and sprinkle with thyme and lemon zest, optional. ; name: baked garlic catfish ; ingredients: catfish fillets, butter, garlic, breadcrumbs, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat over to 375f. Dredge filets in butter. Dredge filets in bread crumbs. Dredge filets in minced garlic. Sprinkle with seasoning salt. Spay small casserole dish add filets and bake covered with foil for 25 minutes. Uncover and broil for 3 or more minutes, depending on if ya want them crispier. Good served with rice and veggie of your choice. ; name: sticky garlic chicken skewers ; ingredients: garlic, honey, tomato ketchup, worcestershire sauce, english mustard, hot pepper sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Soak 12 bamboo skewers, each 10 inches long, in water for at least 20 minutes. Meanwhile, mix together the garlic, honey, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, mustard and hot pepper sauce, and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Toss in the chicken and stir until well combined, transfer to a nonmetallic dish, cover and marinate for 20 or 30 minutes or overnight. Prepare the outdoor grill or preheat the broiler to high. Thread the marinated chicken onto the skewers. Cook over the hot coals of an outdoor grill for 5 to 6 minutes or arrange on a foil-lined baking sheet and broil for 6 to 7 minutes, turning occasionally until well browned and cooked through. ; name: parsleyed rice with peas ; ingredients: butter, onions, rice, water, bay leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, frozen peas, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: weight watchers chicken cheese steaks ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, boneless skinless chicken breast, sweet red pepper, table salt, black pepper, reduced-calorie hot dog buns, reduced-fat american cheese ; preparation:In a medium nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute onion until browned and very soft, about 10 minutes. Add chicken and pepper and saute until chicken is golden brown and cooked through, about to 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toast buns. Spoon chicken mixture down center of each one. Place a slice of cheese in each bun and close bun to help cheese melt slightly. Yields 1 cheese steak per serving. ; name: chocolate cinnamon muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, ground cinnamon, salt, light brown sugar, semisweet mini chocolate chips, eggs, low-fat milk, sunflower oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely. ; name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: ambrosia sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, orange, lemon, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, butter, shredded coconut, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in a baking dish. Slice orange and lemon into thin slices. Alternate layering slices on top of sweet potatoes. Combine drained pineapple, brown sugar and melted butter. Pour mixture over sweet potatoes. Sprinkle with shredded coconut. Decorate with cherries. Bake in a 350f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: rich topping for steaks or veal ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, tomato ketchup, sour cream, tabasco sauce, black pepper, grainy mustard, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix first 7 ingredients with a fork. Roast or grill meat until nearly done as you like it. Spread the cheese mixture over each portion of meat. Sprinkle over the parmesan. Grill carefully -- watching -- until the cheese melts. Serve immediately on warmed plates. ; name: baked chicken lemon and pea risotto ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken breast fillets, leeks, lemon zest, arborio rice, chicken stock, frozen peas, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, mint ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c 400f. Heat a fry pan over high heat add oil and chicken and cook for 3 mins each side or until well browned, set aside. Add leeks and zest to the pan and cook for 5 mins until leeks are golden. Place leek mix, rice and stock in a baking dish, cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 20 mins. Add chicken and peas to the risotto and cover tightly and bake for further 20 mins. The risotto will be quite liquid at this stage. Stir the parmesan, lemon juice, mint and salt and pepper through the risotto. Stir for 2 mins to thicken then serve. ; name: mexican beef spaghetti pie ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic powder, salt, ground cumin, tomatoes and green chilies, light sour cream, monterey jack cheese, spaghetti, egg ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook pasta 8 minutes, drain. Mix pasta shell ingredients and toss with pasta. In 9-inch pie plate press pasta to form a shell. Cook ground beef for 4-5 min., breaking into crumbles. Add garlic powder, salt and cumin, stir in tomatoes and cook until almost all liquid has evaporated, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and add sour cream. Spoon mixture into pasta shell. Add cheese to top and bake 15 minutes. ; name: weight watchers ww roasted squash risotto ; ingredients: butternut squash, fresh rosemary, red onion, risotto rice, vegetable stock, garlic cloves, light cream cheese, balsamic vinegar, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: peach royale ; ingredients: peaches, nonfat milk, pineapple-orange juice concentrate, sugar, vanilla, ice cubes ; preparation:If desired, set aside four fruit slices for garnish. In blender, combine milk and juice concentrate. Add remaining fruit, sugar and vanilla. Cover and blend until smooth. Add ice cubes. Cover and blend until nearly smooth. If desired, garnish each serving with reserved fruit. ; name: casserole cookies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, dates, flaked coconut, walnuts, vanilla, almond extract ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar gradually beating until fluffy. Stir in remaninig ingredients. Place into an ungreased 2 qt casserole. I use a 9 x 9 pyrex pan. Bake in oven at 350 for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and stir well. Cool. Form into balls and roll in granulated sugar. ; name: glazed carrots with ginger ; ingredients: unsalted butter, baby carrots, sugar, chicken broth, gingerroot, golden raisins, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skilloet over medium heat, tilting pan to coat completely. Add carrots and cook for 1 minute. Add sugar and stir to combine, cook for 1 minute. Add chicken broth, grated ginger, raisins, salt and pepper and cook for 20 minutes or until carrots are tender when pierced with a fork. Serve warm. Makes 4 servings. ; name: steakhouse au gratin potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, unsalted butter, gruyere, half-and-half, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, thyme, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Peel and dice the potatoes. I have a vegetable chopper from williams-sonoma and this step only takes 5 minutes. Parboil the potatoes 5 minutes in salty water. Either spray a large baking dish with oil or rub it lightly with butter. Drain and then toss the potatoes in the baking dish with the butter, thyme, nutmeg, more salt and pepper. Mix almost all the cheese throughout the potatoes and pour the half & half evenly over all. Top the dish with the reserved cheese. Bake for one hour or until the cheese is nicely melted, bubbling and turning a caramel color. ; name: fudge dessert fondue sauce ; ingredients: evaporated milk, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, butter, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Heat milk and sugar to rolling boil, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Add chocolate, stirring until melted. Beat over heat until smooth. Remove from heat. Blend in butter, vanilla, and salt. ; name: easy dijon chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, milk, dijon mustard, fine dry breadcrumb, dried tarragon ; preparation:Whisk together milk and dijon mustard. Have crumbs and tarragon mixed toegther in another bowl. Dip chicken pieces in milk mixture, and then dip them in crumbs. Place in a shallow baking dish in a single layer. Cover and bake in a preheated 375f oven for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake for a further 15 minutes, or until chicken is done as you like. ; name: amish pineapple delight ; ingredients: orange gelatin, lemon gelatin, chunk pineapple, miniature marshmallows, cool whip, maraschino cherries ; preparation:In a bowl, mix orange gelatin according to instructions. In separate bowl, mix lemon gelatin according to package directions. Put in refrigerator till each is set. Drain pineapple and cherries. Cut gelatin into cubes. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Chill several hours and serve. ; name: chocolate turtle pie ; ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, butter, pecans, milk chocolate, graham cracker pie crusts, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:

name: creamy avocado with bacon dip ; ingredients: avocado, sour cream, hot sauce, imitation bacon bits, lemon juice, onion powder ; preparation:Pit, peel, and mash the avocado with a fork. Blend in the lemon juice, blending well and then add the sour cream, blending well. Mix in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill for at least an hour. Cooking time is chilling time. Give a good stir before serving to make sure ingredients are well blended. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: grilled pork chops with cilantro lime vinaigrette ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, salt, pepper, canola oil, fresh lime juice, garlic clove, red pepper flakes, olive oil, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Whisk together 1st four vinaigrette ingredients, slowly add oil whisking constantly. Add cilantro. Set dressing aside. Season chops with salt and pepper, brush with oil, grill over med-high heat 5-6 minutes, or until done, turning once. Put chops onto serving platter, pour dressing over chops and serve immediately. ; name: delicious parmesan cheese italian bread crumbs ; ingredients: bread, garlic, ground thyme, oregano, poultry seasoning, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place bread on pan and put into oven for approximately 6 minutes leave oven on. Remove from oven and let bread cool slightly. Then add to food processor along with spices ground until desired consistantcy. Return crumbs to oven, spreading evenly, for approximately 5-6 minutes. Or until lightly toasted. Remove from oven and let cool. Add parmesan cheese and stir until evenly mixed. ; name: salmon cutlets in indian creamy sauce ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onions, garlic cloves, coconut milk, chopped tomatoes, spices, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Chop onions and garlic. Heat 4 tablespoons of olive oil in a saucepan. Add the onions and fry at medium heat for about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and the spices to the onions. Mix well and leave to cook for another 5 minutes. Add the chopped tomatoes and the coconut milk. Season the sauce. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. 10 minutes before the end, fry the salmon cutlets in a separate fry pan until slightly golden season the salmon. Serve with the sauce and basmati rice. ; name: peanut butter butter and sugar toast ; ingredients: white bread, peanut butter, butter, sugar ; preparation:Mix peanut butter, butter and sugar in small bowl. Set aside. Toast bread. Spread toast with peanut butter mixture. Enjoy while warm. ; name: grandma s barbecue spareribs ; ingredients: spareribs, onion, oil, lemon juice, vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, ketchup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put ribs into a large baking pan, cover with approximately 1 cup of water. Sprinkle tops with salt and pepper. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees fahrenheit. Chop onion and saut in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer for 20 minutes. Pour sauce over the ribs and continue baking for 1 hour. Remove foil and cook approximately 10 minutes more. ; name: freezer coleslaw ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, green pepper, salt, wine vinegar, sugar, celery seed, mustard seeds ; preparation:Mix veggies with salt. Let stand one hour. Squeeze out juice. Set aside. Boil vinegar, sugar and seeds. Cool. Mix with veggies. Put into small freezer proof containers. ; name: ranch style lentils ; ingredients: dry lentils, salt, water, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, ketchup, prepared mustard, vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: low carb sweet and sour chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken, white onion, diet orange soda, soy sauce, white vinegar, ground ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, black pepper ; preparation:Brown chicken and onions in a non-stick pan sprayed with cooking spray. When chicken is brown, add the remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer for about 20 minutes until the chicken is tender and thoroughly cooked. Uncover and reduce liquid until it makes a syrupy sauce. A little arrowroot powder may be added to thicken the sauce, if desired. ; name: lekvar kugel prune plum ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, farmer cheese, cream cheese, butter, vanilla sugar, light cream, eggs, plum filling, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:In a food processor mix cheeses, butter, and sugar till creamy. Add cream and eggs. Mix cooked noodles with cream mixture in a large bowl. In a buttered baking dish add half of noddle mixture top with lekvar then top with rest of noodle mixture. Sprinkle cinnamon and sugar. Bake 350 degrees for one hour. ; name: cream delight with whiskey irish recipe ; ingredients: oatmeal, almonds, whipping cream, honey, irish whiskey, lemon juice ; preparation:Using a baking tray with baking paper on it, toast the oatmeal and almonds at 300 fahrenheit for 5 to 10 minutes, mixing repeatedly, making sure not to let the mixture burn. Whip the cream but not overly so and stir in the honey. Next, mix in the whiskey, oats, almonds and lemon juice. Mix well and then pour the mixture into long serving glasses. Chill and serve cold. ; name: green tomatoes veggies ; ingredients: zucchini, green tomatoes, onion, eggplant, sweet red peppers, garlic, olive oil, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare the vegetables. Remove the skin from the head of garlic but do not crush the cloves or chop them. Leave the garlic cloves whole. Heat about 2 to 3 tbsps. Of olive oil on high in a heavy skillet. Add the sweet pepper and onion and garlic and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all. ; name: bea s favorite egg salad ; ingredients: miracle whip, cider vinegar, salt, onion, worcestershire sauce, mustard, pepper, eggs, celery, green peppers ; preparation:In medium bowl, stir miracle whip and vinegar, salt, onion, worchestershire sauce, mustard and pepper until well mixed. Cut up the eggs and add them along with celery, add green pepper to the miracle whip mixture. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate till well chilled. Serve as you like. ; name: chris steak sauce a1 copycat ; ingredients: orange juice, raisins, soy sauce, white vinegar, dijon mustard, orange peel, ketchup, chili sauce ; preparation:Bring to a boil for 2 minutes stirring. Remove from heat. Allow to cool to lukewarm. Put mixture in a blender till it is pureed. Pour in bottle. Cap tightly and refrigerate to use within 90 days. ; name: ham fried rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, oil, garlic, onion, soy sauce, eggs, ham, teriyaki sauce, peas ; preparation:In a wok or frying pan heat 2 tbsp oil. Add onions and garlic. Saut until onions are tender. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and ham. Let sit 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally. The less you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. Add peas, cover and let stand 5 minutes. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. ; name: kilasara potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion ; preparation:

name: grammy s corn cakes ; ingredients: white cornmeal, flour, eggs, salt, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, sugar, oil, butter ; preparation:Mix together dry ingredients. Mix the wet ingredients in a separate bowl. Add the two mixtures together. Do not overmix. Melt 3 t butter in an iron skillet over medium high heat. Pour batter into the skillet, making the cakes about the size of a large biscuit. Cook until golden brown and flip over. Serve with butter and jam. ; name: diet pineapple muffins ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, artificial sweetener, salt, margarine, crushed pineapple, egg ; preparation:Combine flour, baking powder, sweetner and salt. Add melted butter. Add beaten egg and 19 oz tin of crushed pineapple. Ingredients will be very thick in texture. Line your muffin pan cups with cupcake papers. Bake 18 minutes at 400f. ; name: pasta with cherry tomatoes and goat cheese ; ingredients: gemelli pasta, cherry tomatoes, goat cheese, brine-cured black olives, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Cook pasta in 6-quart pot of boiling water until tender. While pasta is cooking, toss tomatoes with salt and let juices exude. Toss hot pasta with goat cheese in large bowl until cheese is melted and coats pasta. Add tomatoes with juices, olives, basil, salt and pepper to taste. Toss and combine. ; name: shimmer tini ; ingredients: vanilla vodka, unsweetened pineapple juice, cream of coconut, key lime juice, ice cube, lime slice ; preparation:In a cocktail shaker, combine vodka, pineapple juice, cream of coconut, and key lime juice. Add ice. Cover and shake vigorously until very cold. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lime slice. ; name: badam pista kulfi ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, condensed milk, bread, badam powder, pista powder ; preparation:Mix all the above ingredients together in a bowl. Make sure eveything blends completely together well. Then fill this mixture either in an ice-cream tray or in kulfi cones. Refrigerate overnight in the frozen section of your refrigerator. At the time of serving the kulfi, put the cones under the flowing hot water tap for only 1-2 seconds, and with a slight jerk, remove it in the individual serving plates. ; name: jab your turkey with lemon garlic marinade ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic, salt, pepper, lemon peel ; preparation:In blender, combine olive oil and lemon juice. While blending, drop in garlic cloves one at a time. Gradually add lemon peel strips. Continue to blend until mixture is pureed. Using an injector, inject marinade into all parts of the thawed turkey. Strain marinade if difficulty passing through injector. Gently massage turkey to distribute marinade. Place turkey in a large plastic bag cooking bag. Close bag and refrigerate overnight. ; name: buttered tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, salt and pepper, sugar, basil ; preparation:Peel tomatoes and remove pulp and seeds. Discard pulp and seeds. Dice the fleshy part of the tomatoes. Melt butter in a skillet. Saut tomatoes in the butter. Stir in the salt and pepper, sugar and basil. Cover and cook about 5 minutes. ; name: caribbean grilled tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, lime juice, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:

name: orange witches brew punch ; ingredients: orange gelatin, sugar, boiling water, apricot nectar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, ginger ale ; preparation:In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice and lemon juice. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat. ; name: crock baked soybeans ; ingredients: dried soybeans, water, yellow onion, light brown sugar, molasses, salt, dry mustard, toasted sesame oil ; preparation:Rinse beans in colander under cold water. Pick over for damaged beans and small stones. Transfer to the slow cooker. Cover with cold water by 2 inches, soak overnight, and drain. Cover with the 4 cups water. Cover and cook on high until tender, about 4 hours. The beans need to be covered with liquid at all times to cook properly. Drain the cooked beans and return to the slow cooker. Add the onion, brown sugar, molasses, salt, mustard, and sesame oil. Stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 5 to 6 hours, until soybeans are flavorful but still moist and the onion is soft. Stir gently so as not to mash the beans and serve hot. ; name: south beach salmon with creamy lemon sauce low carb ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, lemon juice, capers, lemon-pepper seasoning, fat free sour cream, salmon fillets ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray. Heat the oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook for one minute. Reduce heat to low. Stir in the lemon juice, capers and lemon-pepper seasoning and cook for 5 minutes. Add the sour cream and cook for 5 minutes or until heated though. Meanwhile, place the salmon on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes or until the fish is just opaque. Serve with the sauce. ; name: swedish cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, butter, lemon juice, dill weed ; preparation:Core cabbage, then shred cabbage. Place in large pot and cook in a small amount of water until tender. Will probably take about 10 minutes. Drain cabbage. Add remaining ingredients to cabbage, and stir. Serve. ; name: southern style honey barbecued chicken ; ingredients: roasting chickens, salt and pepper, onion, tomato sauce, honey, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, paprika, hot pepper sauce ; preparation:Place chicken, skin side down, in a large baking dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine remaining ingredients. Mix well. Pour mixture over chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for 30 minutes turn pieces and bake 20 minutes longer or until chicken is glazed and no longer pink. ; name: jacob s middle eastern lentil soup ; ingredients: dried lentils, water, olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, ground cumin, ground red pepper, salt, lemon juice ; preparation:Rinse lentils, discarding and stones, or blemished lentils. Drain. Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until hot. Add onion and bell pepper, cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Add cumin and ground red pepper and stir 1 minute. Pour in the 4 cups of water and the lentils. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 20 minutes. Stir in salt and simmer 10 minutes more or until lentils are tender. Stir in lemon juice and serve. ; name: roast beef sandwiches au jus ; ingredients: french onion soup, beef consomme, deli roast beef, provolone cheese, hoagie rolls, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium pot simmer roast beef slices, consomme, and soup until fully cooked. Meanwhile, slice hoagie rolls in half lengthwise, sprinkle with garlic and toast until golden brown. Once the meat has heated through and cooked down, place on half of the hoagie rolls and top with slices of cheese as needed to cover meat. Broil until cheese melted and bubbly. Spread mayo on other half of hoagie rolls and top, cutting sandwich in half diagonally. Cut on a diagonal and serve with au jus on the side. ; name: margaret lefever s wonderful baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, brown sugar, catsup, barbecue sauce, dry mustard, bacon ; preparation:

name: mexican crinkles ; ingredients: vegetable shortening, granulated sugar, egg, light corn syrup, unsweetened chocolate, flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together shortening, sugar and eggs. In a microwave safe bowl, melt chocolate. Add to shortening mixture. Stir in corn syrup. Sift in flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Shape into balls the size of walnuts. Roll balls in granulated sugar. Place cookies about 2-inches apart on parchment lined baking sheets. Bake for 12 minutes. ; name: ham hash browns casserole ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, cream of mushroom soup, ham, dried thyme, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, onion, french-fried onions ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. In a bowl, add all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with french fried onions and bake an additional 10 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: a homemade sundae ; ingredients: vanilla ice cream, hersheys chocolate syrup, chocolate ice cream, marshmallow creme, nuts, whipped cream ; preparation:In tall sundae glass start with a drizzle of chocolate syrup. Place 1 scoop vanilla ice cream and drizzle liberally with chocolate syrup. Place 1 scoop chocolate ice cream next and add generous scoop of marshmallow creme. Sprinkle with 1-2 tablespoons finely chopped assorted nuts. Garnish with canned whipped cream around the edge only. For best results, gently warm the chocolate syrup and marshmallow creme before placing in sundae. ; name: gluten free dairy free egg free pancakes ; ingredients: tapioca flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, cooking oil, baking powder, water, brown sugar, rice flour ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients first. Add oil and water, mix well. Use ladle to measure desired mixture into desired non-stick skillet. Cook as desired, flip and cook opposite side. Remove from heat. Use cooking spray to grease skillet with before cooking pancakes, or use 1 teaspoon butter to grease skillet, if desired for added flavor. ; name: cream of morel mushroom soup ; ingredients: morel, chicken stock, heavy cream, celery, onion, black pepper, kosher salt, butter, flour, olive oil ; preparation:Cook onions and the celery in the olive oil. Stir often till soft. Add morel mushrooms and cook about 6 to 7 more minutes. Add butter and slowly stir in the flour. Now add the chicken stock, salt and pepper. Bring to a low boil, reduce to a simmer and cook 10 to 15 more minutes. Add heavy cream and continue to cook another 10 minutes. ; name: easy kielbasa pasta ; ingredients: kielbasa, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce, baby spinach, penne pasta ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook kielbasa in frying pan. Combine all ingredients into casserole dish except cheese. Sprinkle cheese on top. Place in oven for 7-10 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes and serve. ; name: lamb with spinach ; ingredients: lamb, salt and pepper, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, bouillon, fresh spinach, oregano, lemon juice, feta cheese ; preparation:Sprinkle salt and pepper over the cubed lamb, heat the oil in a dutch oven and brown the meat on all sides. Add the onion and garlic and fry until the onion gets translucent. Add the stock, bring to the boil, lower the heat, cover and simmer slowly for 40- 50 minutes or until the meat is tender. Was the spinach and cook for about 5-7 minutes, without adding any water, drain very well and chop roughly. When the lamb had its cooking time, add the spinach together with the oregano and the lemon juice. On a medium heat and stirring regularly, cook until most cooking juices have evaporated, but it should still be moist. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with the feta cheese. ; name: tangy avocado orange salad ; ingredients: oranges, red leaf lettuce, avocado, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: queen of puddings ; ingredients: fresh white breadcrumbs, butter, caster sugar, lemon, rind of, milk, eggs, raspberry jam ; preparation:Set oven to 350f or mark 4. Butter a 1 pint pie dish. Put the breadcrumbs, butter, 1 oz of the sugar, and the lemon rind into a bowl and mix together. Heat the milk in a pan and pour over the breadcrumb mixture. Beat the egg yolks and mix into the breadcrumbs. Pour into the pie dish and bake for about 35 minutes until set. Remove from the oven and spread the jam on top of the pudding. Reduce the oven to 300f or mark 2. Whisk the egg whites stiffly and fold in the remaining caster sugar. Pile this meringue on top of the jam layer and sprinkle with caster sugar. Bake for about another 30 minutes until the meringue is firm and brown on top. ; name: hot layered hero sandwich ; ingredients: honey mustard, deli turkey, genoa salami, mozzarella cheese, red onions, deli ham, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, romaine leaves, bread ; preparation:Cut bread in half. Carefully hollow out part of the bottom and top of bread and discard this or give it to the birds. Spread mustard on cut sides of bread. On the bread bottom layer in the order given above except for the lettuce. The lettuce goes on after it comes out of the oven. Replace top and wrap in heavy-duty foil. Place on baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 12-15 minutes or till heated through. Unwrap and put the lettuce on top of the tomato layer. Cut into wedges. ; name: very easy baked tilapia fillets ; ingredients: tilapia fillets, mild salsa, mayonnaise, olive oil, seasoning salt, havarti cheese ; preparation:Spray or coat 8x8 glass baking dish. Add fillets and season. Mix other ingredients and pour over fillets. Preheat oven to 400. Bake15-20 minutes. ; name: maple splurge ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, water, butter, kahlua, heavy whipping cream, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:First, fill a glass with ice water and place close to stove. Combine syrup, brown sugar, water, butter and kahlua in a medium sauce pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring occasionally. Turn down heat to medium and stir constantly for 6-7 minutes while mixture boils and until it begins to get thick. Place a drop or two of the mixture into the cup of ice water and then pick it up with your fingers. It should be able to be shaped into a soft ball. Remove from heat. Cool slightly, about 5 minutes, and then whisk in the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans until they are well blended. For a thicker sauce use slightly less whipping cream. Pour into a container, a glass jar is best, and refrigerate until serving, preferably overnight. For a more boozy version, add kahlua with the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans. ; name: tex mex egg burritos ; ingredients: pork sausage, eggs, green chilies, picante sauce, cheddar cheese, 8-inch flour tortillas ; preparation:Brown sausage in a large skillet, stirring to crumble. Drain and return to skillet. Add eggs and chilies to sausage. Cook, stirring gently, until eggs are thickened, but still moist. Do not stir constantly. Microwave tortillas about 10 seconds each until soft. Spoon egg mixture down centers of warm tortillas. Top each with picante sauce and cheese. Fold opposite sides over filling. Serve immediately. ; name: upside down caramel rolls ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, brown sugar, pecans, cinnamon, butter, cooking spray ; preparation:Spray a muffin pan generoulsy with cooking spray. Combine sugar, butter, nuts and cinnamon. Divide sugar mixture evenly among 8 muffin cups. Place a biscuit in each cup over the sugar. Bake at 425 for about 10 minutes. Invert onto a platter immediately upon pulling these out of the oven. ; name: creamy tomato sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream cheese, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: crock pot chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, deli ham, cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: deep dish pizza quiche ; ingredients: cream cheese, eggs, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, pizza cheese, garlic powder, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Beat together cream cheese and eggs till smooth. Add cream, parmesan cheese and spices. Spray a 9-inch or larger glass baking dish with oil. Put the cups pizza cheese in dish and pour egg mixture over it. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes or until eggs are set. Spread on pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese and favorite toppings. Bake until bubbly and browning. Let stand 10 minutes. Serve. ; name: french vanilla bread pudding for 2 ; ingredients: cinnamon-raisin bread, egg, non-dairy coffee creamer, caramels, pecans, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Place the bread cubes in two greased 6-oz. Custard cups. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and creamer. Pour over the bread. Sprinkle with the caramel pieces, nuts, and cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly before serving. ; name: miss minda s super sunshine cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, applesauce, eggs, mandarin oranges in light syrup, cool whip, vanilla instant pudding mix, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Ignore the directions on the box cake mix and instead, in a medium bowl, add the cake mix, applesauce, eggs and mandarine oranges.
